Nyuma y'ibyo umwami aracururuka, yibuka ibyo Vashiti yakoze n'iteka yaciriweho, ntiyongera kumwitaho.
Bamwe mu byegera by'umwami baravuga bati: “Nibashakire umwami abakobwa b'isugi kandi bafite uburanga.

None rero umwami natoranye abantu yizeye mu bihugu byose by'ubwami bwe, abashinge gushaka abakobwa b'isugi kandi bafite uburanga, babazane mu nzu y'abagore b'umwami mu mujyi wa Shushani. Babashyikirize Hegayi inkone y'ibwami ishinzwe abagore, maze babahe ibyangombwa byose byo kwirimbisha.
Bityo umukobwa uzanyura umwami azabe umwamikazi mu mwanya wa Vashiti.” Umwami ashima iyo nama maze arayemera.
I Shushani habaga Umuyahudi witwaga Moridekayi mwene Yayiri, mwene Shimeyi mwene Kishi
Moridekayi uwo yari umwe mu bajyanywe ho iminyago
Moridekayi ni we wasigaye arera Esiteri, umukobwa wa se wabo Abihayili. Yari yarapfushije ababyeyi be bombi maze Moridekayi aramurera kugira ngo azamurongore. Uwo mukobwa yari afite uburanga.

Nuko umwami atanga itegeko abakobwa benshi bajyanwa i Shushani, kandi Esiteri yari umwe muri bo, maze na we ashyirwa mu ngoro y'umwami babashyikiriza Hegayi wari umurinzi w'abagore b'umwami. Muri abo bakobwa bazanamo na Esiteri.

Hegayi akunda Esiteri ndetse aramutonesha. Hegayi amuha amavuta yo kwisīga n'ibyokurya byiza kugira ngo arusheho kuba mwiza. Amuha n'abaja barindwi batoranyijwe mu bo mu ngoro y'umwami, amufata neza hamwe n'abaja be mu nzu y'abagore bagenewe umwami.
Esiteri ntiyari yarigeze avuga ubwoko bwe cyangwa igihugu cye, kubera ko Moridekayi yari yarabimubujije.
Buri munsi Moridekayi yagendagendaga hafi y'inzu y'abagore b'umwami, kugira ngo amenye amakuru ya Esiteri n'uko amerewe.
Abo bakobwa bahabwaga igihe cy'amezi cumi n'abiri yo kwirimbisha: mu mezi atandatu abanza bisigaga amavuta meza, atandatu aheruka akaba ayo kwisiga amarashi n'andi mavuta ahumura neza.
Icyo gihe kirangiye buri mukobwa yahabwaga umuntu watoranyijwe kugira ngo amuherekeze, akamuvana mu nzu y'abagore akamujyana mu ngoro akamushyira umwami.

Buri mukobwa yagendaga nimugoroba akavayo mu gitondo, agashyirwa mu yindi nzu y'abagore b'umwami, akarindwa na Hegayi inkone yari ibishinzwe. Uwo mukobwa ntiyongeraga gusubira aho umwami ari keretse amuhamagaje.

Igihe kiragera Esiteri asanga umwami. Uwo Esiteri yari umukobwa wa Abihayili se wabo wa Moridekayi. Esiteri yari yarakurikije inama zose yagiriwe na Hegayi, kandi buri wese wamubonaga yaramutangariraga.
Ku itariki ya cumi y'ukwezi kwa Adari
Nuko Esiteri anyura umwami kurusha abandi bakobwa bose bamubanjirije, maze aramutonesha. Umwami amwambika ikamba ku mutwe, amugira umwamikazi mu cyimbo cya Vashiti.

Hanyuma umwami akoreshereza Esiteri ibirori bikomeye by'iminsi irindwi, atumira ibyegera bye n'abatware bose, kandi asonera abantu bo mu gihugu cye cyose umusoro. Uwo munsi atanga n'impano nyinshi hakurikijwe ubuntu bw'umwami
Icyo gihe Moridekayi yari umukozi ukomeye w'ibwami,

kandi Esiteri yari ataravuga ubwoko bwe, kubera ko Moridekayi yari yarabimubujije. Esiteri yakomeje kumvira Moridekayi nk'igihe yari akimurera, kandi akomeza kubaha Imana no gukurikiza amabwiriza yayo, ntiyateshuka ku migenzereze y'Abayuhudi.
Icyo gihe hari inkone ebyiri zategekaga abarindaga ingoro, ari zo Bigitani na Tereshi, barakazwa n'uko Moridekayi yahawe umwanya ukomeye, ndetse bafata umugambi wo kwica Umwami Ahashuwerusi.
Ariko Moridekayi atahura ubugambanyi bwabo, ahita abimenyesha Esiteri na we abigeza ku mwami.
Umwami amaze gukora iperereza bigaragara ko ari ukuri, hanyuma izo nkone ebyiri zimanikwa ku giti. Umwami ategeka ko byandikwa mu gitabo cy'amateka
Nyuma y'ibyo Umwami Ahashuwerusi aha umwanya ukomeye Hamani Bugayo mwene Hamedata, amugira Minisitiri w'intebe.
Umwami yategetse abakozi bose b'ibwami kujya bapfukamira Hamani, ariko Moridekayi we yanga kumupfukamira.
Abandi bakozi b'ibwami baramubaza bati: “Kuki utumvira itegeko ry'umwami?”
Buri munsi barabimubwiraga ariko ntabyiteho. Aho bigeze Moridekayi ababwira ko ari Umuyahudi, ko adashobora gupfukamira Hamani nk'uko umwami yabitegetse.
Hamani amenye ko Moridekayi yanze rwose kumupfukamira aramurakarira cyane,
yiyemeza gutsemba Abayahudi bose bari batuye mu gihugu cya Ahashuwerusi.

Mu mwaka wa cumi n'ibiri Ahashuwerusi ari ku ngoma, Hamani ategeka ko hakoreshwa ubufindo kugira ngo amenye umunsi n'ukwezi azatsemberaho ab'ubwoko bwa Moridekayi. Ubufindo bwerekana itariki ya cumi n'enye z'ukwezi kwa Adari

Nuko Hamani abwira Umwami Ahashuwerusi ati: “Nyagasani, hari ubwoko buri hirya no hino mu baturage b'igihugu cyawe. Umuco w'abo bantu ntaho uhuriye n'uw'andi moko kandi ntibajya bumvira amategeko yawe, ndabona nta mpamvu yo kubareka ngo bakomeze batyo.
None rero nyagasani niba bikunogeye, ufate icyemezo cyo kubatsemba. Ibyo bizatuma nshyikiriza abashinzwe umutungo w'umwami ibikoroto ibihumbi icumi
Umwami aherako yikura mu rutoki impeta iriho kashe ye, ayiha Hamani kugira ngo ayitere ku nzandiko zo kugirira nabi Abayahudi.
Nuko umwami abwira Hamani ati: “Ibyo bikoroto by'ifeza ubyigumanire, kandi ubwo bwoko ubugenze uko ushaka.”

Ku itariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa mbere Hamani atumiza abanditsi b'umwami, bandika inzandiko zikubiyemo amabwiriza ye, bazoherereza abagaba b'ingabo n'abategetsi b'ibihugu ijana na makumyabiri na birindwi, n'abatware b'andi moko uhereye mu Buhindi ukageza i Kushi.

Intumwa zihutira kugeza izo nzandiko mu bihugu byose bya Ahashuwerusi, kugira ngo barimbure Abayahudi bose babanyage n'umutungo wabo. Ibyo byagombaga gukorwa umunsi umwe, ku itariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri ari ko Adari.
[1] Dore ibyari bikubiye muri urwo rwandiko:
“Ahashuwerusi umwami ukomeye, yandikiye abategetsi n'abatware b'ibihugu ijana na makumyabiri na birindwi ayobora uhereye mu Buhindi ukageza i Kushi, ibi bikurikira:

[2] “Hanyuma yuko mbaye umutegetsi w'ibihugu byinshi n'umutware w'isi yose, nyamara ntabitewe no kwirata ububasha mfite ahubwo nshaka kuyoborana abantu banjye ubugwaneza, nagambiriye kugarura umutekano no guharanira icyateza igihugu imbere kugira ngo kibe nyabagendwa kuva ku mupaka kugera ku wundi, no kugarura amahoro abantu bose bifuza.

[3] “None nabajije abajyanama banjye uko nshobora kugera kuri iyo ntego, Hamani umwe mu bajyanama banjye atanga igitekerezo cye. Uwo Hamani azwi ho ko ari umunyacyubahiro muri twe, kandi buri gihe yagaragaje ko aharanira ibyagirira igihugu akamaro. Kubera ubushishozi n'ubudahemuka bwe, yahawe umwanya wa kabiri mu gihugu.

[4] Mu minsi ishize Hamani yatubwiye ibyerekeye ubwoko bw'abantu bari bakwiriye hose muri iki gihugu, atubwira ko abo bantu bafite amategeko yabo bwite anyuranye n'ayandi moko, kandi bagasuzugura amategeko y'umwami. Iyo migenzereze yabo ibangamira ubumwe bw'igihugu, dushaka kuyobora mu butabera n'ubutungane.

[5] “Maze kumenya ko abo bantu bahora bashyamiranye n'abandi, bakironda kandi bakagira n'amategeko yabo bwite, menya kandi ko kuba barwanya ubutegetsi bwanjye bibatera kwigomeka bikabije, bakabangamira umutekano w'igihugu.

[6] Kubera ibyo ntegetse ko abo bantu bavuzwe na Hamani, Minisitiri wacu w'intebe, baba abagore n'abana bicwa bose ntihagire usigara. Ni abanzi bacu ntituzabababarira. Iri tegeko rigomba gukurikizwa, uhereye ku itariki ya cumi n'enye z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri ari ko Adari muri uyu mwaka.
[7] Abo bantu bateye imidugararo igihe kirekire bazapfa urupfu rubi mu munsi umwe, maze guhera icyo gihe ubutegetsi bwacu buzagire amahoro n'umutekano.”
[14] Ibikubiye muri izo nzandiko bitangazwa mu bihugu byose, kandi abantu bose barārikirwa kwitegura uwo munsi.
[15] Iryo teka ryamamazwa hose ndetse bigera no mu mujyi wa Shushani. Icyo gihe umwami na Hamani baranywa barasinda, maze umujyi wuzuramo umuvurungano.
Moridekayi amenye icyo cyemezo ashishimura imyambaro ye, yambara imyambaro igaragaza akababaro kandi yisīga ivu.
Ageze ku irembo ry'ingoro y'umwami arahagarara, kuko atari kwemererwa kwinjira ibwami yambaye imyambaro igaragaza akababaro kandi yisīze n'ivu.
Mu bihugu byose izo nzandiko zoherejwemo, Abayahudi baraborogaga kandi bakajya mu cyunamo, bambaraga imyambaro igaragaza akababaro bakaryama mu ivu.

Abaja b'umwamikazi Esiteri n'abagaragu be b'inkone bamubwira ibyabaye kuri Moridekayi, maze bimukura umutima. Nuko amwoherereza indi myambaro kugira ngo yiyambure igaragaza akababaro, ariko Moridekayi arabyanga.
Nuko Esiteri ahamagaza Hataki, umwe mu nkone z'ibwami wari umugaragu we, amutuma kuri Moridekayi ngo amusobanuze ibyamubayeho.
Moridekayi amusobanurira ibyabaye byose, n'uko Hamani yasezeranye gushyira ibikoroto ibihumbi icumi by'ifeza mu mutungo w'umwami, kugira ngo atsembe Abayahudi.

Aha Hataki kopi y'iteka ryatangajwe i Shushani ryo gutsemba Abayahudi, kugira ngo ayishyikirize Esiteri. Moridekayi amutegeka kubwira Esiteri ngo ajye gutakambira umwami asabire ubwoko bwe imbabazi. Atuma kandi kuri Esiteri ati: “Ibuka igihe wari umuntu woroheje nkikurera. Dore Minisitiri w'intebe Hamani yasabye umwami ngo badutsembe. Nuko rero utakambire Nyagasani kandi uduhakirwe ku mwami, udukize uru rupfu!”
Hataki aragaruka atekerereza Esiteri ibyo Moridekayi yamubwiye byose.
Esiteri ategeka Hataki kujya kubwira Moridekayi ati:

“Abatuye igihugu bose bazi ko umuntu wese, yaba umugabo cyangwa umugore winjira ibwami adatumijwe n'umwami agomba kwicwa, keretse uwo umwami atunze inkoni ye y'izahabu ni we uzarokoka. Naho jyewe hashize ukwezi kose ntaratumizwa n'umwami.”
Hataki ashyikiriza Moridekayi igisubizo cya Esiteri.
Nuko Moridekayi atuma Hataki ati: “Genda ubwire Esiteri uti: ‘Ntiwibwire ko kuba uri mu ngoro y'umwami, ari byo bizatuma urokoka mu Bayahudi bose bari muri iki gihugu.

Koko rero niwicecekera mu gihe nk'iki, Abayahudi bazatabarwa ku bundi buryo, ariko wowe n'umuryango wawe muzatsembwa. Nyamara ni nde wabimenya? Birashoboka ko wabaye umwamikazi kugira ngo uzagire akamaro mu gihe nk'iki.’ ”
Nuko Esiteri atuma kuri Moridekayi ati:

“Genda ukoranye Abayahudi bose bari i Shushani, maze mwigomwe kurya kandi munsabire. Mumare iminsi itatu n'amajoro atatu, nta cyo murya nta n'icyo munywa. Nanjye n'abaja banjye tuzabigenza dutyo. Hanyuma y'ibyo nzasanga umwami nubwo nzaba nishe itegeko, niba ari ugupfa nzapfe.”
Moridekayi aragenda akora ibyo Esiteri yamutegetse byose.
[1] Nuko Moridekayi atakambira Uhoraho, amwibutsa ibyo yakoze byose avuga ati:
[2] “Uhoraho, Uhoraho, Mwami Nyirububasha, ibyo waremye byose birakumvira, nta n'umwe wagutambamira ushatse gukiza Isiraheli.
[3] Ni wowe waremye ijuru n'isi n'ibitangaza byose biri ku isi.
[4] Nyagasani, uri Umugenga wa byose kandi ntawe ushobora kukurwanya.
[5] Nyagasani uzi byose, uzi neza ko kwanga gupfukamira umwirasi Hamani ntabitewe n'agasuzuguro cyangwa gushaka ikuzo,
[6] kuko no kumurigata ibirenge nabikora kugira ngo Abisiraheli barokoke.
[7] Nyamara Mwami wanjye, nabikoreye kugira ngo ntaha umuntu icyubahiro cyari gikwiye Imana. Nta we nzigera mpfukamira atari wowe, kandi sinzaba mbitewe no kwirata.
[8] “None rero Nyagasani Mana, Mwami Mana ya Aburahamu, dukize abanzi bacu kuko bagambiriye kuturimbura, biyemeje kudutsemba twebwe abo witoranyirije kuva kera.
[9] Ntudutererane twebwe abo wirokoreye ukatuvana mu Misiri.

[10] Nyagasani, umva isengesho ryanjye utugirire imbabazi twebwe abo witoranyirije, akababaro kacu ugahindure ibyishimo, kugira ngo tubeho kandi turirimbe izina ryawe. Ntiwemere ko abagusingiza bicwa.”
[11] Abisiraheli bose na bo batera hejuru, baratakamba n'imbaraga zabo zose kuko urupfu rwari rubugarije.
[12] Umwamikazi Esiteri yari mu kaga gakomeye, na we yisunga Nyagasani.

[13] Amaze kwiyambura imyambaro ye ya cyamikazi, yambara imyambaro igaragaza akababaro n'icyunamo. Mu cyimbo cy'imibavu y'agaciro yisīga ivu n'imyanda, ntiyongera kwiyitaho no kurimba, areka no gusokoza.
[14] Nuko atakambira Uhoraho Imana ya Isiraheli avuga ati: “Nyagasani Mwami wanjye, ni wowe Mana wenyine. Ntabara dore ndi jyenyine kandi nta wundi wabasha kungoboka atari wowe,
[15] kuko ngiye guhara ubuzima bwanjye.

[16] Nyagasani, kuva mu buto bwanjye bene wacu bambwiraga ko ari wowe watoranyije Isiraheli mu mahanga yose, witoranyiriza ba sokuruza bacu kugira ngo babe abantu bawe iteka ryose, kandi wakomeje amasezerano wagiranye na bo.
[17] “Nyamara twagucumuyeho, utugabiza abanzi bacu
[18] kuko twayobotse ibigirwamana byabo. Koko uri intabera, Nyagasani!
[19] Nubwo batugize inkoreragahato ntibibanejeje, ahubwo bagiranye amasezerano n'ibigirwamana byabo
[20] yo kuburizamo amategeko yawe, bagatsemba Abisiraheli witoranyirije, bakazibiranya abagusingiza, bagahumanya Ingoro yawe n'urutambiro rwawe.
[21] Bashaka ko amahanga asingiza ibigirwamana byabo bitagira umumaro, kandi agahora yubahiriza umwami uzapfa.

[22] “Nyagasani, ububasha bwawe ntubuhe ibigirwamana bitagira ubuzima, kandi ntuzemere ko abanzi bacu badukwena igihe tuzaba turimbuka. Umutego baduteze abe ari bo bawugwamo kandi uwacuze uwo mugambi umuhane wihanukiriye.
[23] “Twibuke Nyagasani, utugoboke muri iki gihe cy'akaga. Nanjye umpe ubutwari, wowe Mwami w'imana zose ukaba n'umugenga w'abategetsi bose.
[24] Ningera imbere y'umwami w'inkazi Ahashuwerusi umpe imvugo iryohereye, uhindure umutima we azinukwe Hamani uturwanya, maze amurimburane n'abo bafatanyije uwo mugambi.
[25] Nyagasani, udukirishe ububasha bwawe kandi untabare kuko ndi jyenyine, akaba ari nta wundi wangoboka atari wowe.
[26] “Nyagasani ni wowe uzi byose, uzi ko nanga icyubahiro mpabwa n'abatubaha Amategeko yawe, uzi kandi ko kuryamana n'umunyamahanga utakebwe bintera ishozi,
[27] nyamara uzi ko nta kundi nagira, ndetse n'ikamba bampatira gutamiriza uko ngiye mu ruhame rintera ishozi nk'igitambaro cyandujwe n'imihango y'abakobwa, bigatuma ntaryambara mu bindi bihe.
[28] Jyewe umuja wawe sinigeze nsangira na Hamani cyangwa ngo nubahirize ibirori by'umwami, kandi sinigeze nywa divayi yatuwe ibigirwamana.
[29] Nyagasani Mana ya Aburahamu, jyewe umuja wawe sinigeze nezerwa kuva nagera hano kugeza uyu munsi, nezerwa gusa iyo ndi kumwe nawe.
[30] Mana Nyirububasha ku bantu bose, umva abagutakira bacitse intege udukize abagome, kandi nanjye umare ubwoba!”
Umwamikazi Esiteri amaze iminsi itatu asenga, yiyambura imyambaro igaragaza akababaro yambara imyambaro y'icyubahiro.
Aririmbisha by'umwamikazi, amaze gusenga Imana ibona byose kandi igakiza, arasohoka ajyana n'abaja be babiri,
umwe agenda amwiyegamije,
naho undi abakurikira afashe ku musozo w'igishura.
Mu maso ha Esiteri hararabagiranga ubwiza ari bwose, yarebanaga urukundo nyamara umutima wari wuzuye ubwoba bwinshi.
Amaze kurenga imiryango yose, ahagarara imbere y'umwami. Umwami yari yicaye ku ntebe ye ya cyami, yambaye imyambaro ya cyami itatsweho izahabu n'amabuye y'agaciro. Umwami yari ateye ubwoba cyane.
Nuko umwami yubura amaso abengerana ikuzo, arebana uburakari umwamikazi Esiteri. Umwamikazi acika intege, mu maso he harahinduka ashaka kwitura hasi, maze yegamira urutugu rw'umuja we.
Ariko Imana ihindura umutima w'umwami, ituma agwa neza. Umwami ahaguruka ku ntebe ye ya cyami, afata Esiteri mu maboko kugeza ubwo ahagurutse. Umwami aramuhumuriza, amubwira amagambo amurema agatima
ati: “Ubaye iki Esiteri? Humura ndagukunda
nta cyo uri bube, kuko itegeko ryacu ribuza abantu kwinjira hano, rireba gusa rubanda rwa giseseka.
Ngaho komeza uze.”
Nuko azamura inkoni ye y'izahabu, ayikoza ku gikanu cya Esiteri. Aramuhobera maze aramubwira ati: “Ngaho mbwira icyo ushaka.”
Esiteri aramubwira ati: “Nyagasani, igihe nakurebaga natekereje ko uri
Nyagasani, koko uri mwiza bitangaje, uburanga bwawe burashamaje.”
Esiteri akivuga ibyo yongera gucika intege yitura hasi.
Umwami bimutera ubwoba, naho abari aho bose bagerageza guhembura Esiteri.
[3] Umwami abaza Esiteri ati: “Urifuza iki? Urasaba iki? Icyo usaba cyose uragihabwa, nubwo cyaba kimwe cya kabiri cy'ubwami bwanjye.”
[4] Esiteri aramusubiza ati: “Nyagasani, ku bwanjye uyu ni umunsi mukuru, niba bikunogeye uzane na Hamani mu birori naguteguriye.”
[5] Nuko umwami aravuga ati: “Nimuhamagaze Hamani tujyane mu birori twatumiwemo na Esiteri.” Umwami na Hamani bajyana muri ibyo birori.
[6] Bakiri mu birori umwami abaza Esiteri ati: “Mwamikazi Esiteri, urifuza iki? Icyo usaba cyose uragihabwa.”
[7] Esiteri aramusubiza ati: “Icyo nifuza kugusaba ni iki:
[8] nyagasani niba ngutonnyeho, unyemerere ejo uzagarukane na Hamani mu bindi birori nzabategurira, nk'ibyo nabateguriye uyu munsi.”
[9] Hamani asohoka mu ngoro y'umwami anezerewe cyane, ageze mu rugo abona wa Muyahudi Moridekayi, ararakara cyane.
[10] Hamani ageze iwe atumiza incuti ze, ahamagara n'umugore we Zereshi.
[11] Nuko Hamani abaratira ubukungu bwe, n'uburyo umwami yamuzamuye akamugira minisitiri w'intebe.
[12] Hamani akomeza agira ati: “Ndetse ni jye jyenyine umwamikazi yatumiye mu birori hamwe n'umwami, kandi yongeye kudutumira n'ejo.
[13] Ariko ibyo byose ntibinejeje, igihe nkibona Umuyahudi Moridekayi ibwami.”

[14] Nuko incuti ze n'umugore we Zereshi baramubwira bati: “Bashinge igiti cya metero makumyabiri n'eshanu, maze ejo mu gitondo uzasabe umwami ko bakimanikaho Moridekayi. Naho wowe igire mu birori hamwe n'umwami winezeze.” Iyo nama inyura Hamani, maze ashinga igiti.
Muri iryo joro Nyagasani ntiyatuma umwami agoheka. Umwami ategeka umunyamabanga we kumuzanira igitabo cy'amateka y'ibyabaye ku ngoma z'abami, kugira ngo akimusomere.
Amusomera ahanditse ko Moridekayi ari we watahuye umugambi wo kwica Umwami Ahashuwerusi, wari wateguwe na za nkone ebyiri zarindaga ingoro y'umwami.
Umwami arabaza ati: “Mbese hari ishimwe cyangwa icyubahiro twahaye Moridekayi kubera icyo gikorwa?”
Abagaragu be baramusubiza bati: “Nta cyo wigeze umuha.”

Igihe umwami yari akibaririza ibyerekeye icyo gikorwa cyiza cya Moridekayi, Hamani aba yinjiye mu rugo ibwami, azanywe no gusaba umwami ngo atange Moridekayi amanikwe ku giti Hamani yari yashinze. Umwami arabaza ati: “Uwo ni nde uri mu rugo?”
Abagaragu barasubiza bati: “Ni Hamani.”
Umwami aravuga ati: “Nimumubwire yinjire.”
Nuko Hamani arinjira maze umwami aramubaza ati: “Nakorera iki umuntu nifuza guhesha icyubahiro?”
Hamani aribaza ati: “Uwo muntu ni nde umwami yifuza guhesha icyubahiro? Nta wundi ni jye.”
Nuko asubiza umwami ati: “Nyagasani, uwo muntu umwami yifuza guhesha icyubahiro,
abagaragu b'umwami nibamuzanire imyambaro myiza y'umweru nk'iy'umwami, n'ifarashi nk'iy'umwami agendaho,

maze utegeke umwe mu byegera byawe, yambike uwo mwambaro umuntu umwami yatonesheje, amwurize na ya farasi. Hanyuma amuzengurutse umujyi atangaza ati: ‘Uko uko umuntu wese umwami yifuza guhesha icyubahiro agenzerezwa!’ ”
Nuko umwami abwira Hamani ati: “Uvuze neza! Ugenzereze utyo Moridekayi, wa Muyahudi uba ibwami. Ntihagire ikintu na kimwe wirengagiza kumukorera mu byo wavuze.”
Hamani azana wa mwambaro awambika Moridekayi, amwuriza ifarasi, amuzengurutsa umujyi atangaza ati: “Uku ni uko umwami agenzereza umuntu wese yifuza guhesha icyubahiro!”
Hanyuma Moridekayi asubira ibwami, naho Hamani ijya iwe yubitse umutwe, afite ikimwaro.

Agezeyo atekerereza incuti ze n'umugore we Zereshi, ibyamubayeho byose. Baramubwira bati: “Ubwo utangiye guta agaciro imbere ya Moridekayi w'Umuyahudi ntuzamushobora, azagutsinda nta kabuza kuko ari kumwe n'Imana.”
Igihe bari bakivugana na we, inkone z'ibwami ziba zirahageze, zijyana Hamani mu birori Esiteri yari yateguye.
Umwami na Hamani bajya mu birori byateguwe n'umwamikazi Esiteri.
Ku ncuro ya kabiri bakiri mu birori, umwami abaza Esiteri ati: “Mwamikazi Esiteri, urifuza iki? Urasaba iki? Icyo usaba cyose uragihabwa, n'ubwo cyaba kimwe cya kabiri cy'ubwami bwanjye.”
Umwamikazi Esiteri aramusubiza ati: “Nyagasani, niba ngutonnyeho, icyo ngusaba ni uko warengera ubuzima bwanjye n'ubwa bene wacu.

Koko rero jyewe na bene wacu n'abana bacu twaraguzwe, kugira ngo tugirwe inkoreragahato n'umutungo wacu usahurwe, none ubu twese tugiye kurimburwa. Kugeza ubu nari naricecekeye, nyamara biteye isoni kubona umwanzi wacu afite umwanya ukomeye ibwami!”
Umwami Ahashuwerusi abaza Esiteri ati: “Uwo muntu ni nde wahangaye kugira umugambi nk'uwo?”
Esiteri aramusubiza ati: “Uwo mugome Hamani ni we mwanzi wacu!”
Nuko Hamani ahinda umushyitsi imbere y'umwami n'umwamikazi.
Umwami asohoka mu birori ajya mu busitani. Hamani abonye ko ari mu kaga atangira kwinginga umwamikazi ngo arengere ubuzima bwe.
Umwami avuye mu busitani, asanga Hamani yikubise ku ifoteyi
Hamani abyumvise acika intege, arumirwa yubika umutwe.

Nuko Bigitani, umwe mu nkone abwira umwami ati: “Nyagasani, Hamani yashingishije igiti cyo kumanikaho Moridekayi, wa mugabo watahuye umugambi w'abashakaga kukwica. Icyo giti gifite metero makumyabiri n'eshanu gishinzwe kwa Hamani.” Umwami ategeka ko bakimanikaho Hamani.
Hamani amanikwa kuri cya giti yari yateganyirije Moridekayi. Bityo umwami ashira uburakari.
Uwo munsi Umwami Ahashuwerusi agabira Esiteri umutungo wose wa Hamani, umwanzi w'Abayahudi. Esiteri amenyesha umwami ko afitanye isano na Moridekayi, maze umwami amutumiza iwe.
Umwami afata impeta ye ya cyami yari yambuye Hamani, ayambika Moridekayi. Esiteri na we agabira Moridekayi umutungo wose wa Hamani.
Esiteri yongera gusanga umwami amwikubita imbere, amusaba kuvuguruza umugambi mubi Hamani yari yarafashe wo gutsemba Abayahudi.
Nuko umwami atunga Esiteri inkoni ye y'izahabu, Esiteri arahaguruka ahagarara imbere y'umwami
aramubwira ati: “Nyagasani, niba bikunogeye kandi nkaba ngutonnyeho, bohereze inzandiko zivuguruza iza Hamani zarimo umugambi wo gutsemba Abayahudi bose batuye mu gihugu cyawe.
Nakwihanganira nte kubona ibyago nk'ibyo bigwirira bene wacu? Gukomeza kubaho byamarira iki, niba bene wacu bose batsembwe?”
Umwami asubiza Esiteri ati: “Namanitse Hamani ku giti kuko yari afite umugambi wo gutsemba Abayahudi, kandi naguhaye umutungo we wose kugira ngo ngushimishe. Ikindi wifuza ni iki?
Mushobora kwandika ibyo mushaka byose mu izina ryanjye mugateraho kashe yanjye, kuko ibyanditswe byose mu izina ryanjye bidashobora kuvuguruzwa.”
Ku itariki ya makumyabiri n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa mbere ari ko kwa Nisani,
Bazandikaga mu izina ry'umwami bagateraho kashe ye, zikajyanwa n'intumwa zihuta cyane.
Izo nzandiko zasobanuraga ko umwami yemereye Abayahudi bo mu mijyi yose y'ibihugu bye, gukurikiza umuco wabo bwite no kwirengera barwanya abanzi babo n'abababangamiraga.
Iri teka ryagombaga kubahirizwa umunsi umwe mu bihugu byose bya Ahashuwerusi, ari wo tariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri ari ko Adari
[1] Iryo teka ry'umwami ryari riteye ritya:
“Jyewe Ahashuwerusi umwami ukomeye, ndaramutsa abatware b'ibihugu ijana na makumyabiri na birindwi, uhereye mu Buhindi ukageza i Kushi, n'abandi bose batuyobotse.
[2] “Abantu benshi bamara kurengwa kubera icyubahiro bakesha abayobozi babo bakarushaho kwirata.
[3] Ntibagirira nabi gusa abo dutegeka, ahubwo iyo bamaze kurengwa bagambanira n'abo bakesha icyubahiro.
[4] Ntibajya bashima ibyiza abantu babagiriye, ahubwo mu bwirasi bwabo bishimira inkozi z'ibibi zibogagiza, bigatuma bibwira ko bashobora guhunga urubanza rw'Imana ibona byose kandi ikanga ikibi.
[5] Byagaragaye kenshi ko abari ku butegetsi bahaye incuti zabo ubuyobozi, bemera ko zibashuka maze bafatanya na zo kumena amaraso y'intungane, kandi bagateza ibyago bikomeye bidashobora gukira.
[6] Kubera amayeri n'uburiganya bw'izo ncuti, zakoresheje umutima mwiza w'abo bategetsi zigamije inyungu yazo.
[7] “Umuntu wese yabona urugero rw'uko gukoresha ubutegetsi nabi, adakurikije amateka yanditswe kera gusa, ahubwo ahereye no ku marorerwa yabaye muri twe muri iyi minsi ishize.
[8] None rero ndagerageza guteganya kugira ngo mu bihe bizaza, mu bwami bwanjye hazabeho amahoro n'ituze ku bantu bose.
[9] Ibi bizashoboka duhinduye amwe mu mategeko, kandi imanza izo ari zo zose zitugejejweho tukazica dukurikije ukuri.
[10] “Urugero twatanga ni urwa Hamani mwene Hamedata ukomoka muri Masedoniya, utagiraga icyo apfana n'Abaperesi. Nyamara namugiriye ubuntu ndamwakira,
[11] ndamukunda nk'uko nsanzwe nkunda abantu bose, ndetse bigeza n'aho mwita umutegetsi wacu. Namuhaye icyubahiro gitambutse icy'abandi bose, uretse umwami.
[12] Nyamara ntibyamunyuze, ahubwo yashatse no kunyica kugira ngo afate ubutegetsi.
[13] Kubera uburyarya bwe n'ishyari, yansabye kwica Moridekayi warokoye ubuzima bwanjye kandi agahora anshyigikiye. Yansabye no kwica Esiteri umwamikazi w'indakemwa ndetse n'Abayahudi bose.
[14] Koko rero yashatse kumaraho abantu, agamije kwegurira Abanyamasedoniya ubwami bw'Abaperesi.
15 Nubwo uwo mugome yari agambiriye kwicisha Abayahudi, nasanze atari abagome, ahubwo ari abantu bagengwa n'amategeko aboneye.
[16] Ni abantu b'Imana nzima, isumbabyose kandi ikomeye, ari yo yakomeje igihugu cyacu kimererwa neza cyane, uhereye igihe cya ba sogokuruza kugeza ubu.
[17] “None rero muzaba mukoze neza nimutita ku biri muri izo nzandiko za Hamani mwene Hamedata,
[18] kubera ko yamanitswe hamwe n'umuryango we wose mu marembo ya Shushani. Bityo Imana Umugenga wa byose yamuciriye urumukwiye.
[19] “Nimumanike kopi z'iri teka ahantu hose hagaragara, mureke Abayahudi babeho bakurikije umuco wabo bwite,
[20] kandi muzabatabare bashobore guhashya abazaba bagambiriye kubarimbura kuri ya tariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri, ari ko Adari
[21] Koko rero Imana igenga byose, uwo munsi kurimburwa k'ubwoko bwatoranyijwe yawuhinduye uw'ibyishimo.
[22] “Namwe rero mujye mwizihiza uwo munsi, uzabe umwe mu minsi mikuru yanyu y'ibyishimo.
[23] Uhereye ubu no mu gihe kizaza, uwo munsi ujye utwibutsa twebwe n'abadushyigikiye ukurokorwa kwacu, kandi ubere abatugambanira urwibutso rwo kurimbuka kwabo.

[24] Buri mujyi cyangwa buri gihugu nta kurobanura, aho batazakurikiza ayo mabwiriza, nzabatsembesha icumu n'umuriro nta kubabarira. Nta muntu uzongera kuhagera, ndetse inyamaswa n'ibisiga bizahazinukwa iteka ryose.
[13] “Kopi z'iri teka zimanikwe ahantu hose hagaragara muri iki gihugu, kugira ngo Abayahudi bose bazabe biteguye kurwanya abanzi babo igihe nikigera.”
[14] Nuko intumwa zigenda ku mafarasi yihuta cyane zikurikiza amabwiriza y'umwami, kandi iryo teka ritangazwa n'i Shushani.
[15] Moridekayi asohoka ibwami yambaye umwambaro wa cyami, atamirije igitambaro cy'umuhemba n'ikamba ry'izahabu. Abantu b'i Shushani bamubonye baranezerwa,
[16] Abayahudi na bo bibatera ishema kandi barishima cyane.

[17] Mu bihugu byose no mu mijyi yose, aho iryo teka ry'umwami ryari rimanitswe, Abayahudi barishimaga bakanezerwa bagakora ibirori. Abanyamahanga barakebwa bahinduka Abayahudi, kubera ko babatinyaga.
Ku itariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri ari ko Adari,
Uwo munsi abanzi b'Abayahudi bararimbutse. Nta muntu wahangaraga Abayahudi kubera kubatinya.
Abategetsi b'ibihugu n'abategetsi b'umwami, bubahaga Abayahudi kubera gutinya Moridekayi.
Iryo teka ry'umwami ryatumye Moridekayi aba ikirangirire mu bihugu byose byategekwaga n'umwami.
I Shushani mu murwa mukuru, Abayahudi bishe abantu magana atanu.

Bishe kandi abahungu icumi ba Hamani Bugayo mwene Hamedata umwanzi w'Abayahudi, na Farisanesitayini na Delifoni, na Fasiga na Faridata, na Bareya na Saribaka, na Marimasimu na Arufayo, na Arisayo na Zabutayo. Abayahudi kandi basahuye umutungo wose w'abanzi babo.
Uwo munsi nyine bamenyesha umwami umubare w'abantu biciwe i Shushani.
Nuko umwami abwira Esiteri ati: “I Shushani honyine Abayahudi bahatsinze abantu magana atanu. Ubwo se ahandi ho byagenze bite? Ngaho mbwira ikindi ushaka na cyo uragihabwa.”
Esiteri asubiza umwami ati: “Reka n'ejo Abayahudi b'i Shushani bazongere bakore nk'ibyo bemerewe gukora uyu munsi, kandi imirambo icumi y'abana ba Hamani imanikwe.”
Umwami yemerera Abayahudi kumanika imirambo icumi y'abana ba Hamani.
Ku itariki ya cumi n'enye z'ukwezi kwa cumi n'abiri ari ko Adari, Abayahudi b'i Shushani bongera gukorana, bicira abandi bantu magana atatu mu mujyi ariko ntibagira icyo basahura.

Kuri iyo tariki ya cumi n'eshatu z'ukwezi kwa Adari, Abayahudi bose bari batuye mu bindi gihugu bitegekwa n'umwami, na bo bari bishyize hamwe kugira ngo birwaneho. Bica abanzi babo ibihumbi cumi na bitanu, ariko ntibagira icyo basahura.
Bukeye bwaho ku itariki ya cumi n'enye ntibakomeza kwica, maze Abayahudi bawugira umunsi w'ikiruhuko n'ibirori.
Naho Abayahudi bo mu murwa w'i Shushani, itariki ya cumi n'eshanu ni yo bagize umunsi w'ikiruhuko n'ibirori, kuko bo bakomeje kwica no ku itariki ya cumi n'enye.
Ni yo impamvu ituma Abayahudi batataniye mu mijyi mito, bizihiza itariki ya cumi n'enye z'ukwezi kwa Adari bagahana amafunguro. Naho abatuye mu mijyi minini bo bizihizaga itariki ya cumi n'eshanu.
Ibyo byose Moridekayi abyandika mu gitabo, acyoherereza Abayahudi bose bo mu gihugu cya Ahashuwerusi, aba hafi n'aba kure.
Abasaba kuzajya bizihiza iyo minsi mikuru, ku itariki ya cumi n'enye n'iya cumi n'eshanu z'ukwezi kwa Adari.

Koko rero kuri ayo matariki ni bwo Abayahudi bikijije abanzi babo, kandi muri uko kwezi kwa Adari ni bwo bavuye mu kaga bongera kunezerwa. Bityo uko kwezi kose kuzaba ukw'iminsi mikuru y'ibyishimo n'ibirori, no guha amafunguro incuti n'abakene.
Nuko Abayahudi biyemeza gukurikiza ibyo Moridekayi yabandikiye byose.
Moridekayi yari yabandikiye uko Hamani mwene Hamedata w'Umunyamasedoniya yari yarwanyije Abayahudi, n'uko yatanze iteka agakoresha n'ubufindo kugira ngo amenye umunsi azabatsembaho.
Yabandikiye uko Hamani yasabye umwami ngo bamanike Moridekayi, ariko ibyago byose Hamani yashakaga guteza Abayahudi byaramugarutse, aramanikwa we n'abana be.
Iyo minsi mikuru yiswe iya
Kubera izo nzandiko za Moridekayi, n'ibyabababaje ndetse n'ibyababayeho byose,

Abayahudi bemeye gukurikiza inama ya Moridekayi, bayigira itegeko kuri bo ubwabo no ku babakomokaho ndetse no kuri buri wese wiyemeje kuyoboka Abayahudi. Iyo minsi yagombaga kwizihizwa ikababera urwibutso uko ibihe bihaye ibindi, muri buri mujyi na buri ntara na buri gihugu.
Abayahudi bagombaga kwibuka kandi bakizihiza iyo minsi ya
Nuko Umwamikazi Esiteri umukobwa wa Abihayili akoresha ububasha bwe, afatanya n'Umuyahudi Moridekayi, bandika urundi rwandiko rwo kwemeza ishyirwaho ry'iminsi mikuru ya
Umwamikazi Esiteri na Moridekayi, na bo ubwabo biyemeza kwizihiza uko bishobotse kose iyo minsi y'ibirori.
Esiteri ategeka ko iyo minsi izajya ihora yizihizwa, kandi iryo teka rikandikwa kugira ngo ritazibagirana.
Umwami Ahashuwerusi ategeka ko abatuye mu birwa n'abatuye mu gihugu batanga imisoro.
Ibikorwa bye byose bikomeye, n'ububasha bwe n'ubutunzi bwe n'ikuzo ry'ubwami bwe, byose byanditswe mu gitabo cy'amateka y'ibyabaye ku ngoma
Moridekayi yari uwa kabiri ku Mwami Ahashuwerusi, yari umuntu ukomeye mu gihugu kandi wubahwa n'Abayahudi bene wabo. Yarakundwaga cyane kuko yaharaniraga amahoro yabo.
[1] Nuko Moridekayi aravuga ati: “Imana ni yo yatumye ibi byose biba.
[2] Koko rero ndibuka inzozi
[3] Narose isōko nto yagūka iba uruzi, nyuma haza urumuri n'izuba n'amazi menshi. Urwo ruzi ni Esiteri umwami yarongoye akamugira Umwamikazi.
[4] Ibiyoka bibiri binini narose bishushanya jyewe na Hamani,
[5] amahanga ni abo bose bifatanyije kugira ngo barimbure Abayahudi,
[6] ubwoko bwanjye bw'Abisiraheli ni bwo bwatakambiye Imana irabakiza. Nyagasani yakijije abantu be, yadukijije ibyo byago byose, yakoze ibimenyetso n'ibitangaza bitigeze bibaho mu mahanga.
[7] Ni yo mpamvu Nyagasani yagennye uburyo bubiri butandukanye bwo kubaho, bumwe ku Bayahudi, ubundi ku banyamahanga.
[8] Nuko umunsi n'isaha biragera, ubwo buryo bwombi burasohozwa. Igihe cyari kigeze kugira ngo Imana isohoze umugambi wayo ku banyamahanga.
[9] Imana yibutse ubwoko bwayo yitoranyirije, iraburenganura.

[10] Ni yo mpamvu buri mwaka mu bihe byose bizakurikiraho, Abisiraheli bazajya bakoranira imbere y'Imana ku itariki ya cumi n'enye n'iya cumi n'eshanu z'ukwezi kwa Adari, bakizihiza iyo minsi mu byishimo n'umunezero.”
[11] Mu mwaka wa kane w'ingoma ya Putolemeyi
Mwebwe bategetsi b'isi, nimukunde ubutungane,
nimuzirikane Nyagasani mu buryo buboneye,
nimumushakashake n'umutima utaryarya.
Koko rero yiyereka abatamugerageza,
yigaragariza abamwemera.
Ibitekerezo bitaboneye bituma abantu batandukana n'Imana,
ububasha bwayo bukoza isoni abapfapfa bayigerageza.
Ubuhanga ntibuboneka mu muntu ukora ibibi,
ntibuba mu mubiri wigaruriwe n'icyaha.
Ubuhanga ni Mwuka Muziranenge ujijura abantu,
koko rero burwanya uburiganya,
ntibubana n'ibitekerezo by'abapfapfa,
ntibwishimira akarengane.
Ubuhanga ni umwuka ugirira abantu neza,
nyamara buhana umuntu uvuga Imana nabi.
Koko Imana izi ibyo umuntu atekereza,
izi neza ibyo umuntu yifuza kandi yumva ibyo avuga.
Mwuka wa Nyagasani yakwiriye ku isi hose,
ni we ukoranyiriza byose hamwe akamenya n'ibihavugirwa byose.
Uvugana ubugome wese ntazabura guhanwa,
ntazarokoka ubutabera bumushinja.
Ibitekerezo by'umugome bizakurikiranwa,
amagambo ye azagera kuri Nyagasani,
bityo azahanirwa ubugome bwe.
Koko Imana yumva byose,
nta jambo na rimwe riyicika.
Mujye mwirinda imyijujuto idafite ishingiro,
mujye mwirinda n'amagambo asebanya.
Koko rero ijambo ridahwitse ntiribura ingaruka,
umuntu usebanya yica umutima we.
Ntimukikururire urupfu muyobya ubuzima bwanyu,
ntimukikururire ukurimbuka bitewe n'ibikorwa byanyu.
Mumenye ko Imana atari yo yaremye urupfu,
ntishimishwa n'ukurimbuka kw'ibinyabuzima.
Ibintu byose Imana yabiremye ishaka ko bikomeza kubaho,
ibyaremwe byo mu isi byagenewe gukomeza ubuzima,
ntibirangwamo uburozi bwica,
urupfu ntirutegeka isi.
Koko rero uharanira ubutungane ntashobora gupfa.
Ibikorwa n'amagambo by'abagome bibakururira urupfu,
bararwifuza nk'aho ari incuti,
bagirana na rwo amasezerano,
koko bakwiye kuruyoboka.
Mu bitekerezo byabo bifutamye barabwirana bati:
“Imibereho yacu ni iy'igihe gito kandi iteye agahinda,
iyo iherezo ryayo rigeze ntirisubizwa inyuma,
nta n'umwe tuzi wigeze kugaruka avuye ikuzimu.
Twavutse ku bw'amahirwe,
nitumara gupfa tuzamera nk'abatigeze kubaho.
Umwuka duhumeka ni nk'umwotsi,
ibitekerezo byacu ni nk'igishashi cy'umuriro,
ni nk'igishashi cyaka uko umutima wacu utera.
Iyo kizimye umubiri uhinduka ivu,
umwuka duhumeka uyoyoka nk'umuyaga.
Uko ibihe bihita izina ryacu rizibagirana,
nta muntu n'umwe uzibuka ibikorwa byacu.
Ubuzima bwacu buzamera nk'igicu gihita,
buzashira nk'igihu kiyoyoka iyo izuba rirashe.
Ubuzima bwacu ni nk'igicucu gihita,
iherezo ryacu ni ntarengwa,
ryashyizweho kandi nta warihindura.
“Nimuze rero twishimishe mu byiza dufite,
nimuze twinezeze nta cyo twikanga nko mu gihe cy'ubusore.
Nimuze dusinde divayi iruta izindi,
nimuze twisige n'imibavu y'agaciro,
indabyo zihumura neza ntituzitangweho,
nimuze dutamirize indabyo za roza zitararabirana.
Ntihagire n'umwe ubura mu munsi mukuru wacu,
ahantu hose tuhasige ibimenyetso by'umunezero wacu,
koko ni wo mugabane wacu n'umunani wacu.
“Nimuze dukandamize umukene w'intungane,
umupfakazi ntitumugirire impuhwe,
umusaza na we ntitumurebe n'irihumye.
Duharanire uburenganzira bwacu dukoresheje ingufu,
koko intege nke ntacyo zimaze.
Twibasire intungane kuko itubuza amahoro,
tuyibasire kuko itubangamira,
idushinja ko tutubahiriza amategeko,
iturega ko twataye umuco mwiza twatojwe.
Intungane yirata ko izi Imana,
yiyita umwana wa Nyagasani.
Ntihwema kugaya ibitekerezo byacu,
kuyireba ubwabyo biratubangamira.
Imibereho yayo inyuranye n'iy'abandi,
imyifatire yayo ntisanzwe.
Idufata nk'ikintu cyataye agaciro,
itugendera kure nk'aho turi imyanda.
Ihamya ko iherezo ry'intungane ari amahirwe,
yirata ko ifite Imana ho umubyeyi.
Nimureke turebe niba ibyo ivuga ari ukuri,
nimureke dusuzume neza iherezo ryayo.
Niba koko intungane ari umwana w'Imana,
Imana izayitabara iyikize abanzi bayo.
Nimuze tuyigerageze tuyitoteza,
bityo tuzamenya aho ukwiyumanganya kwayo kugarukira,
tuzareba ukwihangana kwayo.
Nimureke tuyitange yicwe urw'agashinyaguro,
niba ibyo ivuga ari ukuri Imana izayitabara.”
Nguko uko abo bantu batekereza, nyamara barayoba,
ubugome bwabo bwabagize impumyi.
Ntibasobanukirwa amabanga y'umugambi w'Imana,
ntibizera igihembo giteganyirijwe intungane,
ntibemera ikuzo ryazigamiwe abantu baboneye.
Koko rero Imana yaremeye umuntu kudapfa,
yamuremye mu ishusho
Nyamara kubera ishyari rya Sekibi urupfu rwinjiye mu isi,
bityo rwigarurira abamuyoboka.
Intungane ziri mu maboko y'Imana,
ntizizongera kubabazwa ukundi.
Abapfapfa bo batekereza ko intungane zipfa buheriheri,
batekereza ko iyo zipfuye ziba zigushije ishyano.
Batekereza ko iyo zipfuye ziba zirimbutse,
nyamara zo zibereye mu mahoro.
Nubwo abantu batekereza ko zahanwe,
nyamara zo zihorana amizero yo kutazapfa.
Ububabare bwazo buroroshye,
buroroshye ugereranyije n'ingororano zizahabwa,
Imana yarazigerageje isanga zikwiye kubana na yo.
Yazigerageje nk'izahabu itunganyirijwe mu ruganda,
yazakiriye nk'igitambo gikongorwa n'umuriro.
Igihe Imana izaza kuzigororera zizarabagirana,
zizarabagirana nk'ibishashi by'umuriro mu byatsi byumye.
Izo ntungane zizacira imanza amahanga kandi zitegeke ibihugu,
Nyagasani azazibera umwami iteka ryose.
Abamwiringiye bazamenya ukuri icyo ari cyo,
abamuyobotse bazibanira na we mu rukundo,
koko agirira ubuntu n'imbabazi abo yitoranyirije.
Abagome bazahabwa igihano gikwiranye n'ibitekerezo byabo,
bahinyuye intungane kandi bimūra Nyagasani.
Koko bazabona ishyano abahinyuye Ubuhanga n'inyigisho zabwo,
ibyo biringira ni impfabusa,
ibikorwa byabo nta cyo bimaze bararuhira ubusa.
Abagore babo ni abapfapfa,
abana babo ni abagome,
urubyaro rwabo rwaravumwe.
Hahirwa umugore w'ingumba utarigeze agira amakemwa,
hahirwa umugore utarigeze akora icyaha cy'ubusambanyi,
azabona ingororano igihe Imana izaca imanza.
Hahirwa kandi inkone itarigeze ikora ikibi,
irahirwa kuko itigeze itekereza ibinyuranyije n'ugushaka kw'Imana.
Izagorererwa ineza y'ubwo budahemuka bwayo,
izahabwa umwanya ushimishije mu Ngoro ya Nyagasani.
Koko rero imbuto z'ibikorwa byiza ni ikuzo,
Ubuhanga ni nk'umuzi w'igiti utigera umungwa.
Nyamara abana babyawe n'umusambanyi bazakenyuka,
urubyaro rukomoka ku mibanire itemewe n'amategeko ruzarimbuka.
Nubwo baramba ntibazitabwaho,
nubwo bagera mu za bukuru ntibazubahwa.
Nibakenyuka ntibazajyana icyizere,
ku munsi w'urubanza ntibazahozwa,
koko amaherezo y'abagome ni ukurimbuka.
Ikiruta ni ukuba ingumba ukarangwa n'imigenzereze myiza,
abagenza batyo ntibazibagirana,
bazashimwa n'Imana ndetse n'abantu.
Iyo bakiriho babera abandi urugero,
iyo bamaze gupfa abantu barababara,
mu bugingo bw'iteka bazambikwa ikamba,
bazagororerwa kuko batsinze intambara.
Urubyaro rw'abagome nubwo rwaba rwinshi ruzaba imburamumaro,
abana b'ibinyendaro ntaho bashingiye,
ntibazashinga imizi ngo bakomere.
Nubwo bagaba amashami ntibakomeye,
iyo umuyaga ubahushye barahungabana,
inkubi y'umuyaga ikabarimbura.
Amashami yabo azavunika akiri mato,
imbuto zabo zizahunguka zidahishije zipfe ubusa.
Koko rero ku munsi w'urubanza abo bana b'ibinyendaro bazashinja ababyeyi babo,
bazagaragaza imyifatire mibi y'ababyeyi babo.
Intungane nubwo yapfa ikenyutse izanezerwa.
Kubaha umusaza ntibiterwa n'igihe amaze,
icyubahiro ntikigereranywa n'ubwinshi bw'imyaka.
Ubuhanga ntiburindira ko umuntu amera imvi,
imibereho iboneye ntirindira ko agera mu za bukuru.
Habayeho umuntu watunganiye Imana iramukunda,
Imana yaramutwaye kuko yabanaga n'abanyabyaha.
Imana yaramujyanye kugira ngo ikibi kitayobya ibitekerezo bye,
yaramujyanye kugira ngo atagwa mu gishuko.
Koko ubushukanyi bw'ikibi buzimangatanya icyiza,
inkubiri y'irari iyobya umutima utaryarya.
Uwo muntu yabaye intungane mu gihe gito,
nyamara yagize ubutungane bwagerwaho mu myaka myinshi.
Umutima we wanyuze Nyagasani,
ni cyo cyatumye avanwa bwangu mu isi y'abagome.
Abantu barabibonye ariko ntibabisobanukirwa,
nta n'ubwo bigeze babizirikana.
Imana igirira ubuntu n'imbabazi abo yatoranyije,
Imana irinda abantu bayo.
Akenshi intungane ipfuye ishinja abakiriho batubaha Imana,
intungane ikenyutse ishinja abasaziye mu bukozi bw'ibibi.
Abantu babona amaherezo y'abanyabwenge,
nyamara ntibazamenya umugambi Nyagasani abafitiye,
ntibazamenya impamvu abaha kuruhukira mu mahoro.
Abantu barabibona bakabihinyura,
ariko Nyagasani azabakoza isoni.
Nyuma y'ibyo bazahinduka intumbi zigayitse,
bazahinduka urw'amenyo iteka ryose mu bapfuye.
Koko bazajugunywa mu mva bacuramye,
ntibazigera bavuga ijambo na rimwe.
Nyagasani azabarimbura abahindure ivu,
bazaba mu mubabaro kandi ntibazibukwa ukundi.
Igihe ibyaha byabo bizaba byagaragajwe,
bazaza bahinda umushyitsi,
ibicumuro byabo bizabashinja.
Icyo gihe intungane izahagarara nta cyo yishisha,
izahagarara imbere y'abayikandamizaga bagahinyura ibikorwa byayo.
Abo bagome bazaterwa ubwoba no kubona intungane nta cyo yishisha,
bazatangazwa n'uko yakijijwe batabitekerezaga.
Bazavugana bababaye kandi bafite ikiniga bati:
“Uyu ni wa muntu kera twahinyuraga,
ni we twahinduye urw'amenyo!
Koko twebwe twari abapfapfa,
twatekerezaga ko ari nk'umuzasi,
twabonaga urupfu ari urukozasoni.
None se abarwa ate mu bana b'Imana,
yabonye ate umugabane mu baziranenge?
Koko twateshutse inzira y'ukuri,
urumuri rw'ubutungane ntirwatumurikiye,
izuba ntiryaturasiye.
Ntitwahwemye kuyoboka inzira y'ibibi no kurimbuka,
twambukiranyije ubutayu butagira inzira,
ntitwamenye inzira ya Nyagasani!
“None se ubwirasi bwatumariye iki?
Ese ubukungu twiratanaga bwatwunguye iki?
Ibyo byose byayoyotse nk'igihu,
byabaye nk'inkuru ihita yibagirana.
Byabaye nk'ubwato bwahuranya imivumba yo mu nyanja,
ntawe ushobora kumenya aho bunyuze,
ntawe ushobora kubona inzira y'indiba yabwo.
Bimeze kandi nk'igisiga kiguruka mu kirere,
ntigisiga uburari bwacyo mu kirere,
gihuha umuyaga woroshye gikoresheje amababa yacyo,
gikubita amababa kikawucamo inzira,
nyamara aho kinyuze ntikihasiga uburari bwacyo.
Bimeze nk'umwambi baboneje ku ntego,
umwuka unyuzemo uhita usubirana,
ntawe ushobora kumenya aho unyuze.
Ni ko natwe tumeze dupfa tukivuka,
nta bikorwa byiza twasize inyuma,
ububi bwacu bwatumye turimbuka!”
Koko icyizere cy'umugome ni nk'umurama utumurwa n'umuyaga,
ni nk'urufuro rukubiswe n'umuhengeri.
Kiyoyoka nk'umwotsi uhushywe n'umuyaga,
gihita nk'urwibutso rw'umushyitsi w'umunsi umwe.
Nyamara intungane zibaho iteka ryose,
ingororano yazo itangwa na Nyagasani,
Usumbabyose azazitaho.
Bazahabwa ikamba ry'ikuzo,
Nyagasani azabatamiriza ikamba ryiza cyane,
azabarindisha ukuboko kwe kw'iburyo,
ukuboko kwe kuzabakingira nk'ingabo.
Ishyaka rye ni ryo rizaba umwambaro w'urugamba,
ibiremwa azabyambika intwaro zo guhashya umwanzi.
Azakenyera ubutabera nk'umukandara,
urubanza rutabera ruzamubera nk'ingofero y'icyuma.
Ubutungane buzamubera nk'ingabo y'umutamenwa,
uburakari bwe budacogora buzaba nk'inkota ityaye,
ibyo yaremye bizafatanya na we kurwanya abapfapfa.
Imirabyo izagenda nk'imyambi iboneje neza,
izamera nk'irashishijwe umuheto ureze cyane,
izasohoka mu bicu iboneje ku ntego.
Amahindu azabagwira afite ubukana,
amazi y'inyanja azabuzuranaho,
inzuzi zizabarengaho nta mbabazi.
Inkubi y'umuyaga izabazibiranya,
umuyaga w'ishuheri uzabakoza hiryo no hino.
Uko ni ko ibicumuro bizarimbura isi,
ibikorwa bibi bizarimbura ingoma z'abami.
Mwa bami mwe, nimwumve maze musobanukirwe,
mwa bategetsi bo ku isi yose mwe, nimujijuke.
Mwa bategetsi b'imbaga mwe, nimutege amatwi,
nimutege amatwi mwe abirata ko mutegeka ibihugu byinshi.
Ububasha mufite mubukesha Nyagasani,
Usumbabyose ni we wabahaye ubutegetsi,
ni we uzasuzuma ibikorwa byanyu n'imigambi yanyu.
Nubwo muri abagaragu b'Usumbabyose,
ntimuca imanza mukurikije ubutabera,
ntimwubahiriza Amategeko,
ntimukora icyo Imana ishaka.
Imana izabagwa gitumo ku buryo buteye ubwoba,
koko abanyabubasha bazacirwa urubanza rukaze.
Aboroheje bazagirirwa impuhwe,
nyamara abanyabubasha bazakurikiranwa bikomeye.
Umutegetsi wa bose ntatinya umuntu uwo ari we wese,
ntamutinya nubwo yaba akomeye.
Aboroheje n'abakomeye ni we wabaremye,
bose abitaho ku buryo bumwe,
nyamara abanyabubasha bazakurikiranwa bikomeye.
Mwa bategetsi mwe, ni mwe mbwira,
ndababwira kugira ngo mwige Ubuhanga maze mureke kuyoba.
Koko abakurikiza Amategeko azira inenge bazitwa intungane,
abayakurikiza azabarengera mu rubanza.
Nimugirire inyota amagambo yanjye,
nimuyifuze mushishikaye muzasobanukirwa.
Ubuhanga butanga umucyo utajya wijima,
ababukunda babubona bitabaruhije,
bwigaragariza ababushakashaka.
Bwihishurira ababwifuza,
bufata iya mbere mu kubiyereka.
Uzinduka abushakashaka ntananirwa,
azabusanga imbere y'umuryango we.
Kubuzirikana ni ko kumenya ubwenge nyakuri,
umuntu udahwema kubushakashaka ntahagarika umutima.
Koko ni bwo bushakashaka ababukwiriye,
bubakirana urugwiro mu mayira,
bubigaragariza mu bitekerezo byabo.
Intangiriro yo kumenya Ubuhanga ni ukubukunda,
ni ukwifuza kujijurwa na bwo no kubusobanukirwa.
Kubukunda ni ugukurikiza amategeko yabwo,
kuyakurikiza bigatanga icyemezo cyo kudapfa.
Uko kudapfa kugaragariza umuntu ko ari kumwe n'Imana,
kugira inyota y'Ubuhanga bigeza umuntu ku bwami.
Yemwe bategetsi b'ibihugu,
niba mwishimira intebe n'inkoni bya cyami,
nimukunde Ubuhanga kugira ngo muganze iteka ryose.
Ariko se Ubuhanga ni iki, bwakomotse he?
Ngiye kububamenyesha nta na kimwe mbahishe,
nzaburondora mpereye ku nkomoko yabwo,
nzagaragaza imiterere yabwo ntateshutse ku kuri.
Sinzagengwa n'ibyifuzo bibi,
koko ntibifitanye isano n'Ubuhanga.
Abahanga nibaba benshi isi izamererwa neza,
umwami ushishoza azatuma rubanda rugubwa neza.
Nimureke mbigishe bizabagirira akamaro.
Nanjye ubwanjye nzapfa nk'abandi,
nkomoka ku muntu wa mbere wabumbwe mu gitaka.
Nasamwe ku bw'imbuto y'umugabo mu byishimo by'urukundo,
namaze amezi icyenda mu nda ya mama,
amaraso ye yarankomeje.
Navukiye ku isi mpumeka umwuka nk'uw'abandi bose,
nahereye ko ndira nk'izindi mpinja,
bamfubitse utwenda banyitaho rwose,
nta mwami n'umwe utarabayeho muri ubwo buryo.
Abantu bose batangira kubaho ku buryo bumwe,
ubuzima bwabo na bwo burangira ku buryo bumwe.
Nasabye Imana ubwenge
narambaje maze umwuka w'Ubuhanga unzamo.
Nabuhisemo kuruta inkoni n'intebe bya cyami,
nasanze ubukungu nta cyo bumaze ubugereranyije n'Ubuhanga.
Sinigeze mbugereranya n'ibuye ry'agaciro,
koko izahabu y'isi yose ni nk'umusenyi ungana urwara,
naho ifeza uyigereranyije na bwo ni nk'icyondo.
Nabukunze kuruta ubuzima n'uburanga,
nabuhisemo bundutira urumuri,
koko umucyo wabwo ntiwijima.
Kubugira byanzaniye ibyiza byose icyarimwe,
bwampaye ubukungu butagira ingano.
Nishimiye ibyo byiza byose Ubuhanga bwanzaniye,
nyamara sinigeze menya ko ari bwo nkomoko ya byose.
Icyo nabwigiyeho mbikuye ku mutima,
nzakimenyesha abandi ntacyo mbakinze,
nta cyo nzagabanya ku bukungu bwacyo,
koko ku bantu ni ubukungu budashira.
Ababwitabiriye bagirananye ubucuti n'Imana,
ibyiza byabwo bibageza ku Mana.
Icyampa ngo Imana impe kuvugana ubwenge,
icyampa ngo impe ibitekerezo bikwiranye n'ingabire nahawe,
koko ni yo igenga Ubuhanga ikayobora abanyabwenge.
Imana ni yo itugenga ikagenga n'ibyo tuvuga,
igenga ubwenge bwacu n'imikorere yacu.
Ni yo yampaye ubumenyi nyakuri bw'ibiriho,
yansobanuriye imiterere y'isi n'imibereho y'ibiyigize.
Yampaye kumenya intangiriro y'ibihe,
yampaye kumenya igihe turimo n'iherezo ryabyo,
yamenyesheje imiterere y'izuba n'imihindagurikire y'ibihe,
yamenyesheje uko imyaka ihita indi igataha,
yamenyesheje n'urugaga rw'ibinyarumuri.
Yamenyesheje kamere y'inyamaswa n'imyifatire yazo,
yamenyesheje imbaraga z'ibinyabubasha n'ibitekerezo by'abantu,
yamenyesheje amoko y'ibimera n'akamaro k'imizi yabyo.
Namenye ibiboneka n'ibitaboneka,
koko Ubuhanga bwahanze byose bwarabimenyesheje.
Koko rero Ubuhanga bubamo umwuka w'ubwenge kandi uzira inenge,
uwo mwuka ni umwe rukumbi kandi wigaragaza mu buryo bwinshi,
ufite ubushishozi kandi ucengera ibintu byose,
ugira ubwibakure bwihariye,
uzira ikizinga kandi ukorera mu mucyo,
ukunda icyiza kandi ukagira ubwira.
Uwo mwuka ntuvogerwa,
ugira neza ukaba n'incuti y'abantu,
ntujegajega, uriringirwa kandi ugatuza,
ushobora byose kandi ugenzura byose,
ucengera imitima yose ifite ubwenge,
ucengera imitima izira inenge kandi ishishoza.
Ubuhanga buratebuka kurusha ibyihuta byose,
bucengera byose kubera ko buzira inenge.
Koko rero Ubuhanga ni umwuka w'ububasha bw'Imana,
ni ubutungane bukomoka ku ikuzo ry'Ushoborabyose,
ni yo mpamvu nta gihumanye cyabwinjiramo.
Ubuhanga ni icyezezi cy'urumuri ruhoraho,
ni indorerwamo izira ikizinga y'ibikorwa by'Imana,
ni ishusho y'ubuntu bwayo.
Nubwo ari bumwe rukumbi bushobora byose,
ntibuhindagurika ariko buvugurura ibiriho byose,
uko ibihe bisimburana butura mu mitima y'intungane,
buzihindura incuti z'Imana n'abahanuzi,
koko Imana yikundira ababana na bwo.
Ubuhanga burusha izuba n'inyenyeri kubengerana,
iyo ubugereranyije n'umucyo burawusumba.
Umucyo usimburwa n'umwijima,
nyamara ikibi ntikiganza Ubuhanga.
Ubuhanga bwisanzura ku isi hose,
buyoborana urugwiro ibiriho byose.
Narabukunze ndabushakashaka kuva nkiri muto,
nabukundiye uburanga bwabwo,
nifuje ko bwambera umugore.
Ikuzo ryabwo rigaragaza inkomoko yabwo nziza,
koko bubana n'Imana Umutegetsi w'ibyaremwe byose.
Ubuhanga bumenya amabanga y'Imana,
ni bwo bwerekana ibikorwa byayo.
Niba ubukungu ari ikintu cyifuzwa mu buzima,
ni iki cyasumba Ubuhanga ari bwo nkomoko ya byose?
Niba ubwenge bushobora kugira icyo bukora,
Ubuhanga bwahanze ibiriho byose ntiburushijeho?
Harya ngo ubutabera burakundwa?
Nyamara ni bwo nkomoko y'imigenzo myiza yose,
bwigisha kumenya kwifata n'ubwitonzi,
bwigisha ubutabera n'ubutwari,
bwigisha n'ikindi cyose cyagirira abantu akamaro mu buzima.
Mbese mwifuza kumenya ibintu n'ibindi?
Ubuhanga bumenya ibyahise n'ibizaza mbere yuko biba,
buzi gusobanura amagambo akomeye n'imigani,
busobanura ibimenyetso n'ibitangaza,
bumenya uko amateka n'ibihe bikurikirana.
Niyemeje kubana na bwo mu mibereho yanjye,
nari nzi neza ko buzambera umujyanama nyakuri,
nari nzi neza ko buzankomeza mu mubabaro no mu kaga.
Nibwiraga ko buzampesha ikuzo muri rubanda,
nibwiraga ko nzubahwa n'abasheshe akanguhe nubwo nari nkiri muto.
Ninca imanza zitabera bazambonamo ubushishozi,
abatware bazantangarira.
Ninceceka bazantegereza,
nimvuga bazantega amatwi,
nintinda mu magambo ntibazandambirwa,
bazifata ku munwa batangare!
Ubuhanga buzandinda gupfa buheriheri,
ab'igihe kizaza nzabasigira urwibutso ruhoraho.
Nzategeka ibihugu maze amahanga anyoboke,
abategetsi bakomeye nibumva izina ryanjye bazakangarana,
nzagirira neza abantu banjye kandi mbe intwari ku rugamba.
Nintabaruka nzaruhukira iruhande rw'Ubuhanga,
koko gushyikirana na bwo ntibigwa nabi,
kubana na bwo ntibitera ishavu,
ahubwo bitera umunezero n'ibyishimo.
Nabitekereje mbikuye ku mutima,
nasanze kubona Ubuhanga birinda urupfu.
Kubukunda bitanga umunezero uhamye,
ibikorwa byabwo birimo ubukungu budashira.
Kubana na bwo bitanga ubushishozi,
abashyikirana na bwo baba ibirangirire.
Ni yo mpamvu nabushakashakiye hirya no hino,
nashatse ko bumbera umufasha.
Koko nari umwana umeze neza,
nari narahawe umutima mwiza,
byongeye kandi navukanye umubiri utanduye.
Nyamara nari nzi ko ntashobora kugira Ubuhanga ntabuhawe n'Imana,
kumenya uwo mbukesha na byo byari ubushishozi,
nambaje Nyagasani mbikuye ku mutima,
Naravuze nti:
“Mana ya ba sogokuruza, Nyagasani Nyir'imbabazi,
ni wowe waremye ibintu byose ukoresheje ijambo ryawe,
waremye umuntu ukoresheje Ubuhanga bwawe,
waramuremye kugira ngo ategeke ibindi biremwa.
Waramuremye kugira ngo ategeke isi mu butungane no mu butabera,
waramuremye kugira ngo ace imanza akurikije ukuri.
Ngusabye kugira uruhare ku Buhanga muri kumwe,
ndagusabye ntunce mu bana bawe.
Koko ndi umugaragu wawe n'umwana w'umuja wawe,
ndi umunyantegenke kandi mbaho igihe gito,
sinsobanukirwa neza ibyerekeye ubutabera n'amategeko.
Nubwo yaba intungane adafite Ubuhanga buguturukaho,
uwo muntu nta cyo yaba ari cyo.
Ni wowe wantoranyije ungira umwami w'abantu bawe,
wangize umucamanza w'abana bawe.
Wantegetse kubaka Ingoro ku musozi wakweguriwe,
wantegetse kubaka urutambiro mu mujyi utuyemo,
wantegetse gukurikiza igishushanyombonera cy'Ihema riziranenge
“Nyagasani, Ubuhanga bubana nawe bukamenya n'ibyo ukora,
ubwo waremaga isi mwari kumwe,
buzi ikigushimisha n'igitunganiye Amategeko yawe.
Bwohereze buve mu ijuru riziranenge,
bwohereze buve ku ntebe y'ikuzo ryawe,
bwohereze buntere inkunga maze menye ikigushimisha.
Koko buzi byose kandi bugasobanukirwa byose,
buzanyoborana ubwitonzi mu bikorwa byanjye,
buzandindisha ikuzo ryabwo.
Nyagasani, ibikorwa byanjye bizakunezeza,
abantu bawe nzabayoborana ubutabera,
bityo nzaba nkwiriye gusimbura data ku ngoma.
“Mana, ni nde washobora kumenya imigambi yawe?
Ni nde washobora gusobanukirwa icyo Nyagasani ashaka?
Ibitekerezo by'abantu nta cyo bimaze,
bihora bihindagurika si ibyo kwiringirwa.
Kamere muntu ibera umuzigo umutimanama,
umubiri upfa ubera umuzigo ibitekerezo byacu.
Ntibitworohera gusobanukirwa ibiri ku isi,
ibituri bugufi na byo tubimenya bituruhije.
None se ni nde wamenya ibiri mu ijuru?
Niba hari uwasobanukiwe umugambi wawe,
yawusobanukiwe kuko wamuhaye Ubuhanga,
ni uko wamuhaye Mwuka wawe muziranenge.
Nguko uko abatuye isi bagaruwe mu nzira iboneye,
uko ni ko abantu bamenye ibigushimisha bityo Ubuhanga burabakiza.”
Ubuhanga ni bwo bwakomeje umuntu waremwe mbere,
se w'abantu wari waremwe wenyine,
ubwo yacumuraga bwamugobotoye mu cyaha,
bwamuhaye ubushobozi bwo kugenga ibyaremwe byose.
Nyamara habayeho umuntu w'umugome
yikururiye kurimbuka kuko yishe umuvandimwe we abitewe n'uburakari.
Igicumuro cy'uwo mugome cyatumye isi irengerwa n'umwuzure,
nyamara Ubuhanga ni bwo bwongeye kuyikiza,
bwayoboye intungane
Igihe amahanga yose yoramye mu bukozi bw'ibibi,
ubwo yahanishwaga kutavuga rumwe,
Ubuhanga ni bwo bwarobanuye umuntu w'intungane,
bwabonye ko ari indakemwa imbere y'Imana,
bwamuhaye ubushobozi bwo kubaha Imana,
bwarabumuhaye nubwo yakundaga umwana we cyane.
Ni bwo bwakijije intungane igihe abagome barimburwaga,
igihe bahungaga umuriro wamanukiraga ku mijyi itanu.
Ingaruka z'ubwo bugome ziragaragara na n'ubu,
aho hantu hahindutse agasi kandi umwotsi ukomeza gucumbeka,
imbuto z'ibiti byaho ntizigera zihīsha,
hari igishyinga cy'umunyu cyabaye urwibutso rw'umuntu wanze kumvira Imana.
Abo bantu basuzuguye Ubuhanga,
ntibashoboye kumenya icyiza,
basigiye ababakomokaho urwibutso rw'ubupfapfa bwabo,
ntibashoboye no guhīshira amafuti yabo.
Nyamara Ubuhanga bwagobotoye abayoboke babwo mu magorwa.
Umuntu w'intungane wahungaga uburakari bw'umuvandimwe we,
Ubuhanga bwamuyoboye inzira zitunganye.
Bwamweretse ubwami bw'Imana,
bwamumenyesheje ibintu bizira inenge.
Bwatumye ahirwa mu bikorwa bye biruhije,
bityo imirimo ye buyiha kurumbuka.
Bwamukijije umururumba w'abamukandamizaga,
bwamuhaye kuba umukungu.
Bwamukijije abanzi be,
bwamurinze abamuciraga ibico.
Bwamurwaniriye intambara ikomeye,
bwamumenyesheje ko kubaha Imana biruta byose.
Ntibwatereranye intungane yagurishijwe,
bwayigobotoye mu cyaha.
Bwamanukanye na yo mu rwobo,
ntibwayitereranye igihe yari muri gereza,
bwayihaye inkoni ya cyami n'ubutegetsi ku bayikandamizaga.
Bwayifashije gutsinda ibinyoma by'abayibeshyeraga,
bwayihaye ikuzo rihoraho iteka.
Ubuhanga bwakijije abantu b'Imana batagira amakemwa,
bwabagobotoye mu nzara z'ababakandamizaga.
Bwinjiye mu mutima w'umugaragu wa Nyagasani,
bwatumye ahangana n'abami b'abanyamaboko,
yahanganye na bo akora ibitangaza n'ibimenyetso.
Bwahaye intungane igihembo cy'imiruho yazo,
bwabayoboye mu nzira y'agatangaza,
bwababereye ubwugamo ku manywa,
bwababereye urumuri mu ijoro.
Bwabambukije Inyanja itukura,
bwabanyujije mu mazi magari.
Nyamara bworetse abanzi babo,
bwabazitse mu muvumba w'ikuzimu,
intungane zicūza abo bagome ibyabo.
Nuko Nyagasani, basingiza izina ryawe riziranenge,
bose hamwe bahimbaza ububasha bwawe bwabakijije.
Koko Ubuhanga bubumbura umunwa w'ibiragi,
bwumvikanisha imvugo y'ibitambambuga.
Ubuhanga bwatumye bagera ku migambi yabo,
bwakoresheje umuhanuzi
Bambukiranyije ubutayu budatuwe,
bashinze amahema yabo ahantu hatigeze hagendwa,
bahanganye n'abanzi babo barabahashya.
Abisiraheli bagize inyota baragutakambira,
wabahaye amazi avubutse mu rutare,
urwo rutare rukomeye rubamara inyota.
Koko wahannye abanzi babo,
igihano wabahanishije cyagobotse Abisiraheli bageze mu kaga.
Abanyamisiri bashatse kubicira abana warabahannye,
wahinduye uruzi amaraso avanze n'icyondo.
Nyamara abantu bawe wabahaye amazi menshi,
wabahaye amazi batari babyiteze,
wayabahaye umaze kubicisha inyota,
wabumvishije ukuntu wahannye abanzi babo.
Koko warabahannye nubwo wabikoranye imbabazi,
biboneye uko abagome bababazwa ubwo wabahanishaga uburakari bwawe.
Abantu bawe wabahannye nk'umubyeyi uhana abana be,
nyamara abo bagome wabahannye nk'umwami utababarira.
Abo bagome baba hafi cyangwa kure bababaye kimwe,
umubabaro wabo wikubye kabiri,
bashenguwe no kwibuka ibyababayeho.
Bamaze kumenya ko igihano bahanishijwe cyabereye Abisiraheli amahirwe,
Nyagasani, byatumye bamenya ko ari wowe wabagobotse.
Uwo Abanyamisiri bari baranitse ku gahinga,
uwo birukanye bamukwena,
igihe cyarageze baramutangarira,
koko bo bishwe n'inyota iruta iy'intungane.
Ibitekerezo byabo bibi byarabayobeje,
byarabayobeje basenga ibikōko bikururuka n'izindi nyamaswa zidafite ubwenge,
warabahannye ubateza ibikōko by'amoko menshi bidafite ubwenge,
warabahannye kugira ngo bamenye ko bazize ibicumuro byabo.
Ku bw'imbaraga zawe zaremye isi ziyikuye mu busa,
washoboraga kubateza ibirura n'intare z'inkazi.
Washoboraga kubateza ibikōko by'inzaduka by'inkazi,
washoboraga kubateza ibikōko bihumeka umwuka utwika,
washoboraga kubateza ibikōko bicumbeka umwotsi,
washoboraga no kubateza ibikōko bifite amaso ateye ubwoba.
Uretse ko izo nyamaswa zashoboraga kubarimbura,
kuzibona ubwabyo byari gutuma bicwa n'ubwoba.
Uretse n'ibyo washoboraga kubicisha umwuka wawe,
bagombaga gukurikiranwa n'ubutabera bwawe,
bagombaga gukangaranywa n'ububasha bwawe.
Nyamara ibyo byose wabishyize kuri gahunda,
warabibaze kandi urabipima.
Uhora ukoresha ububasha bwawe bukomeye,
ni nde washobora guhangana nawe?
Ku bwawe isi ni nk'akantu gato gapimwe ku munzani,
ni nk'agatonyanga k'ikime kaguye ku butaka.
Nyamara ugirira bose impuhwe kuko ushobora byose,
wirengagiza ibyaha by'abantu kugira ngo bihane.
Ukunda ibiremwa byose kandi nta na kimwe wanga mu byo waremye,
koko iyo ugira icyo wanga muri byo ntuba warakiremye.
None se ni ikihe kiremwa cyari kubaho utabishatse?
Ni iki cyari gukomeza kubaho utarakiremye?
Nyagasani, ukunda ibyo waremye byose,
urabikunda kuko ari ibyawe.
Koko rero umwuka wawe udapfa uri mu biremwa byose.
Nyagasani, ukosora buhoro buhoro abacumuye,
urababurira ukabibutsa ibicumuro byabo,
urabibutsa kugira ngo bareke ibibi bakugarukire.
Abari batuye igihugu wiyeguriye warabanze,
warabanze kubera ibikorwa byabo biteye ishozi,
bakoraga iby'ubupfumu n'imihango izira.
Abo bantu bicaga abana babo nta mbabazi,
bakoraga ibirori bakarya inyama z'abantu bakanywa n'amaraso.
Abo babyeyi bica ibibondo bidashoboye kwirengera,
washatse ko batsembwa na ba sekuruza,
washatse ko igihugu ukunda kuruta ibindi giturwa n'abakwiriye kuba abana b'Imana.
Nyamara abo na bo wabagiriye imbabazi kuko bari abantu,
wohereje inzuki zibanziriza ingabo zawe,
warazohereje ngo zibarimbure buhoro buhoro.
Abo bagome washoboraga kubagabiza intungane ku rugamba,
washoboraga guhera ko ubatsembesha inyamaswa z'inkazi ukoresheje itegeko ritababarira.
Nyamara wabahannye buhoro buhoro,
wabahaye igihe cyo kwihana.
Ntiwari uyobewe ko kamere yabo ari mbi,
ntiwari uyobewe ko bavutse ari abagome kandi badashobora guhindura imico,
koko ni ubwoko bwavumwe
Niba warabaretse ntubahanire ibicumuro byabo,
ntibyatewe n'uko hari uwo watinyaga.
Ni nde watinyuka kukubaza ati: “Wakoze ibiki?”
Ni nde wakwanga icyemezo cyawe?
Ni nde uzakuregera ko warimbuye amahanga wiremeye?
Ni nde wabasha guhinguka imbere yawe arengera abagome?
Nta yindi mana uretse wowe yakwita kuri bose,
imana wakwereka ko uca imanza z'ukuri.
Nta n'umwami cyangwa umutegetsi n'umwe,
umwami wahangara kurengera abo wahannye.
Koko uri intungane kandi ibyaremwe byose ubitegekana ubutabera,
guhana udakwiye guhanwa biciye ukubiri n'ububasha bwawe.
Imbaraga zawe ni zo sōko y'ubutabera,
uri umutegetsi w'ibyaremwe byose kandi ubyitaho byose.
Ugaragaza imbaraga zawe,
uzigaragaza iyo abantu bahinyuye ububasha bwawe,
uhana abirata ko bazi ububasha bwawe kandi babusuzugura.
Nyamara uri Nyirububasha,
udutegekesha ubwiyoroshye n'imbabazi,
ukoresha ububasha bwawe igihe cyose ubishatse.
Wigishije abantu bawe ko intungane igomba kuba incuti y'abantu,
wahaye abana bawe icyizere,
wabahaye icyizere cy'uko bamaze gucumura bashobora kwihana.
Igihe wahanaga abanzi b'abana bawe waraboroheye,
waraboroheye nubwo bari bakwiye gupfa,
wabahaye igihe n'uburyo bwo kwihana ibibi byabo.
Nyamara abantu bawe wabahannye bikomeye,
warabahannye nubwo wari waragiranye amasezerano na ba sekuruza.
Iyo uhana abanzi bacu mu bwiyoroshye uba utwigisha,
uba utwigisha kugira ngo tuzirikane imbabazi zawe igihe duca imanza,
bityo igihe uducira imanza twiringire impuhwe zawe.
Wahannye abigometse bitewe n'ubupfapfa bwabo,
warabahannye kubera ibikorwa byabo biteye ishozi.
Koko barateshutse bakurikira inzira itari iy'ukuri,
barateshutse basenga inyamaswa zigayitse kurusha izindi,
bashutswe nk'abana bato bataragira ubwenge.
Wabahaye igihano nk'icy'abana bato,
icyo gihano cyatumye bakorwa n'isoni.
Nyamara abasuzuguye icyo gihano cyoroheje,
abo Imana yabahanishije igihano gikomeye.
Bamaze guhanwa kubera ibyo bikōko bibwiraga ko ari imana,
bamenye ko Imana y'ukuri ari iyo bari baranze kwemera,
ni cyo cyatumye bahabwa igihano gikomeye.
Abantu bose batigeze bamenya Imana ni abapfapfa,
abo bantu babonye ibyiza biriho,
nyamara ntibashoboye kumenya Uriho,
babona ibyo yaremye ariko ntibamenye Uwabiremye.
Ntibigeze bamenya Uwabiremye,
batekereje ko imana zitegeka isi ari umuriro n'umwuka,
inkubi y'umuyaga n'urujeje rw'inyenyeri,
imivumba y'amazi n'ibinyarumuri byo mu kirere.
Abo bantu bayobejwe n'uburanga bwabyo babyita imana,
bagombaga kumenya ko bifite Umugenga uruta byose,
koko Uwabiremye ni we nkomoko y'uburanga.
Niba baratangajwe n'ububasha bwabyo n'akamaro kabyo,
bagombaga kumenya ko Uwabiremye abirusha ububasha.
Koko rero iyo tuzirikanye ubuhangange n'uburanga bw'ibyaremwe,
bituma tumenya neza ubuhangange bw'Uwabiremye.
Abo bantu ntibari bakwiye kugawa cyane,
koko basaga n'aho bashakashaka Imana no kuyimenya by'ukuri,
nyamara ntibabishobora.
Bari bagituye rwagati mu biremwa byayo,
baharaniye kubimenya neza batwarwa n'uburanga bwabyo,
koko ibyo babonaga basanze ari byiza cyane.
Nyamara kandi abo bantu si abo kubabarirwa,
koko niba bari bafite ubwenge bwo kumenya ibyaremwe,
kuki batashoboye kumenya Umugenga w'ibyo byose?
Baragowe abo bantu biringira ibintu bitagira ubuzima,
baragowe abita imana ibyakozwe n'abantu,
ibyo ni amashusho y'inyamaswa yacuzwe mu izahabu no mu ifeza,
ibuye ritagira agaciro ryabajwe n'umuntu wa kera na ryo baryita imana.
Umubāji atema igiti ashobora kwikorera,
agishishuraho ibishishwa neza akakibazanya ubuhanga,
agikoramo igikoresho gikenewe.
Ibice bisigaye abicanisha umuriro,
abitekesha ibyokurya agashira inzara.
Nyamara muri ibyo bice bisigaye bidafite akamaro,
ibice bigoramye cyangwa bifite amasubyo,
afata kimwe muri byo akabibaza igihe aruhuka,
akibaza abyitayeho maze akagiha ishusho y'umuntu,
ashobora no kugiha ishusho y'inyamaswa iteye ishozi.
Hanyuma iyo shusho ayisiga irangi ry'umutuku,
atunganya kandi ahantu hose hari ubusembwa.
Iyo amaze kuyitegurira ahantu hatunganye mu rukuta,
ayishyiramo akayifatisha icyuma,
akora uko ashoboye kose kugira ngo itagwa.
Koko azi neza ko yo ubwayo nta cyo ishoboye,
ni ishusho gusa ikeneye gushyigikirwa.
Nyamara uwo muntu yashaka gusabira ibintu bye,
iyo ashaka gusabira urugo rwe cyangwa abana be,
ntaterwa isoni no gutakambira icyo kintu kitagira ubuzima.
Iyo ashaka kumererwa neza atakambira icyo kintu kidafite ubushobozi,
iyo ashaka ubuzima atakambira icyapfuye,
iyo ashaka inkunga yitabaza ikitagize icyo gishoboye,
mu ngendo ze yiragiza ikitabasha gutambuka.
Naho ku byerekeye imibereho ye,
ibikorwa bye no guhirwa ku murimo we,
asaba imbaraga ikintu kitazifite.
Undi muntu na we yitegura kwambuka inyanja irimo imivumba ikaze,
atakambira ishusho y'igiti,
igiti cyamunzwe kurusha ubwato bumutwaye.
Umuntu yabaje ubwo bwato kugira ngo abone inyungu,
uwo mubaji yabukoranye ubuhanga,
nyamara wowe Data, ubushishozi bwawe ni bwo buyobora ubwo bwato.
Koko ni wowe wahanze inzira yabwo mu nyanja,
mu mivumba rwagati wahashyize inzira nyabagendwa.
Wagaragaje ko ushobora kugoboka abantu mu makuba yose,
urabagoboka nubwo banyura mu nyanja batabizobereyemo.
Ushaka ko ibikorwa by'Ubuhanga bwawe bigira akamaro,
ni yo mpamvu abantu biringira igiti kitagira shinge na rugero,
bambuka inyanja irimo imivumba bakoresheje ubwato budakomeye,
barambuka bakagera imusozi ari bataraga.
Ni ko byagenze no mu gihe cya kera,
igihe abirasi b'ibihangange barimbukaga,
uwari icyizere cy'isi yahungiye mu bwato ayobowe nawe,
bityo asiga urubyaro rw'ibisekuruza bizaza.
Haragahirwa igiti cyahindutse igikoresho cy'ubutungane,
nyamara havumwe ikigirwamana cyakibajwemo n'uwakibaje.
Uwo muntu avumwe kuko yakibaje,
icyo kigirwamana kivumwe kuko cyiswe imana kandi kibora.
Koko rero Imana yanga umugome n'ubugome bwe,
izahana icyo kigirwamana n'uwagikoze.
Imana izibasira ibigirwamana by'amahanga,
izabyibasira kuko ari ibizira mu biremwa byayo,
ibiremwa biyobya abantu bikabera abapfapfa umutego.
Igitekerezo cyo gukora ibigirwamana ni cyo nkomoko y'ubusambanyi,
kubikora ni byo byatumye abantu bayoba.
Koko ntibyigeze bibaho kuva mu ntangiriro,
nta n'ubwo bizabaho iteka ryose.
Ubwirasi bw'abantu ni bwo bwabizanye ku isi,
ni yo mpamvu iherezo byagenewe ritazatinda.
Umubyeyi wababajwe cyane n'urupfu rw'umwana we rutunguranye,
yakoresheje ishusho y'umwana we wari ukindutse,
bityo uwo mubyeyi aha icyubahiro uwapfuye nk'aho ari imana,
hanyuma aha abantu be umurage wo kubahiriza ayo mabanga n'iyo mihango.
Uko ibihe byagiye bisimburana uwo muco urakomera,
warakomeye kugeza ubwo wubahirizwa nk'itegeko.
Abategetsi na bo bashyizeho itegeko ryo gusenga amashusho abajwe.
Abantu batashoboraga gushengerera umwami kuko batuye kure,
bakoraga ishusho y'umwami bakayiramya,
bityo bakamuha icyubahiro nk'aho ahibereye.
Umunyabukorikori yayikundishaga abatamuzi bakamuramya.
Uwo munyabukorikori kugira ngo ashimishe umwami,
yakoraga ishusho nziza cyane.
Abantu bakururwa n'ubwiza bw'iyo shusho,
uwo umwami bahaga icyubahiro gikwiriye umuntu,
yahindutse imana isengwa.
Nguko uko abantu baguye mu mutego,
iyo babaga bari mu byago cyangwa bakandamijwe,
bafataga ibintu bikozwe mu mabuye cyangwa mu biti,
babyitiriraga Imana.
Kuba barayobye ntibamenye Imana ntibyabahagije,
ahubwo ubujiji bwabahejeje mu ntambara z'urudaca,
ibyago nk'ibyo bageze ubwo babyita amahoro.
Bishe abana babo bubahiriza imihango ififitse,
basenze ibigirwamana bakora ibiteye ishozi.
Ntibacyubaha ubuzima ndetse n'imibanire y'abashakanye,
umuntu yica mugenzi we amugambaniye,
aramubabaza iyo amusambanyiriza umugore.
Ibintu byose byabaye akajagari,
ubwicanyi n'ubujura n'ubuhendanyi,
ubushukanyi n'ubuhemu,
imidugararo n'uburiganya,
gutoteza abanyamurava no kwibagirwa ineza,
guta umuco no gukoresha imibiri ibinyuranye n'ibyo yaremewe,
ubwumvikane buke bw'abashakanye,
ubusambanyi n'ubwomanzi.
Koko rero gusenga ibigirwamana bitagira izina,
ni byo ntangiriro n'impamvu n'iherezo ry'icyitwa ikibi cyose.
Abantu babisenga birabanezeza bigatuma bata umutwe,
bahanura ibinyoma kandi ntibagira gahunda mu mibereho yabo,
ntibatinya kurenga ku ndahiro.
Biringira ibyo bigirwamana byabo bitagira ubuzima,
biringira ko indahiro zabo z'ibinyoma nta ngaruka mbi zizabatera.
Nyamara bazahanwa kubera izi mpamvu ebyiri,
biyibagije Imana bayoboka ibigirwamana,
birengagije ubutungane barahira ibinyoma.
Nubwo badatinya ububasha by'ibyo bigirwamana barahira,
izo nkozi z'ibibi zizahanishwa igihano cyateganyirijwe abanyabyaha.
Ariko wowe Mana yacu, ugira ubuntu ukaba n'indahemuka,
utinda kurakara kandi ibyo waremye byose ubitegekana impuhwe.
Iyo twacumuye tugumya kuba abawe kuko tuzi ububasha bwawe,
nyamara ntituzacumura kuko tuzi ko turi abawe.
Koko kukumenya ubwabyo ni ubutungane bwuzuye,
kumenya ububasha bwawe ni isōko yo kudapfa.
Ntitwayobejwe n'ibikorwa bibi byahanzwe n'abantu,
ntitwayobejwe n'umurimo udafite agaciro w'abasīga amarangi,
ntitwayobejwe n'amashusho asize amabara anyuranye.
Amashusho abyutsa irari ry'abapfapfa,
atuma bararikira ishusho itagira ubuzima.
Abakora ayo mashusho bakayararikira kandi bakayasenga,
abo ni bo boramye mu bibi.
Umubumbyi ukāta ibumba afite umwete,
aribumbamo ibikoresho byo mu rugo,
muri iryo bumba kandi abumbamo ibikoresho by'ingirakamaro n'ibisanzwe.
Umubumbyi ubwe ni we ugena icyo buri kintu kizakora.
Hanyuma uwo mubumbyi atangira umurimo udafite akamaro,
muri rya bumba abumbamo ikigirwamana kitagira shinge na rugero,
uwo muntu ubumba icyo kigirwamana yavuye mu gitaka,
azagisubiramo bidatinze, igihe azaba yambuwe ubugingo yatijwe.
Uwo muntu ntatekereza ko ubuzima bwe ari bugufi,
ntajya atekereza ko azapfa nta kabuza,
arahiganwa n'abashongesha izahabu n'ifeza,
yigana abashongesha umuringa,
yirata ko abumba ibitagira shinge na rugero.
Umutima we umeze nk'ivu,
icyizere cye kirushwa agaciro n'umukungugu,
imibereho ye isuzuguritse kurusha ibumba.
Koko yasuzuguye Uwamuremye,
uwamuhumekeyemo umwuka w'ubuzima.
Kuri we ubuzima bwacu ni nk'umukino,
imibereho yacu ni nk'isoko rigamije inyungu.
Uwo muntu abona ko ari ngombwa gushakira inyungu muri byose nubwo byaba bibi.
Uwo mubumbyi ubumba ibigirwamana n'ibindi bikoresho bidakomeye,
arusha abandi kumenya ko acumura.
Nyamara Nyagasani, abo banzi bakandamije abantu bawe,
bose ni abapfapfa bikabije,
ibitekerezo byabo biri inyuma y'iby'abana bato.
Ibigirwamana byose by'amahanga babyita imana,
bifite amaso ariko ntibibona,
bifite amazuru ariko ntibihumeka,
bifite amatwi ariko ntibyumva,
bifite intoki ariko ntibikabakaba,
bifite amaguru ariko ntibigenda.
Koko byo ubwabyo byakozwe n'umuntu,
byabumbwe n'umuntu watijwe umwuka.
Nta muntu washobora kubumba imana isa nawe.
Uwo mubumbyi ni umuntu uzapfa,
ibyo akora na byo biba bipfuye.
Aruta kure ibyo bigirwamana asenga,
koko we afite ubuzima ariko byo ntibyabwigeze.
Abo bantu basenga ibikōko biteye ishozi,
ibikōko bigayitse kurusha ibindi.
Iyo ubigereranyije n'izindi nyamaswa, usanga nta bwiza bifite,
Imana ntiyigeze ibishima,
nta n'umugisha yabihaye.
Abo bantu basengaga ibikōko,
byari bikwiye ko bahanishwa udukōko twinshi tukabajujubya.
Nyamara wowe Nyagasani, aho guhana abantu bawe wabagiriye imbabazi,
wabahaye inturumbutsi kugira ngo ubamare inzara,
ni byo byokurya byiza wabateguriye.
Abo bantu basengaga ibigirwamana nubwo bari bashonje,
batewe iseseme n'ibikōko biteye ishozi wabateje,
byatumye bazinukwa kugira icyo barya.
Naho abantu bawe bamaze gusonza igihe gito,
babonye ibyokurya byiza cyane.
Byari bikwiye ko abo babakandamizaga baterwa n'inzara idashira,
bityo abantu bawe bakibonera uburyo abanzi babo bajujubijwe.
Igihe abantu bawe bari bugarijwe n'ibikōko biteye ubwoba,
igihe bicwaga n'inzoka zifite ubumara,
uburakari bwawe ntibwakomeje ngo bubarimbure.
Nyamara bababajwe igihe gito byo kubaburira,
hanyuma wabahaye ikimenyetso cy'agakiza,
wagiraga ngo ubibutse Amategeko yawe.
Koko uwarebaga icyo kimenyetso yarakiraga,
ariko ntiyabaga akijijwe n'icyo kimenyetso,
ahubwo yakizwaga nawe, wowe Mukiza w'abantu bose.
Ibyo byagaragarije abanzi bacu ko ari wowe ukiza abantu ikibi cyose.
Abanzi bacu barumwe n'inzige n'isazi barapfa,
bapfuye bazize kutabona umuti wabakiza,
koko bari bakwiriye guhanishwa udukōko nk'utwo.
Nyamara abantu bawe ntibarimbuwe n'inzoka zifite ubumara,
kubera impuhwe zawe warabagobotse urabakiza.
Wabateje inzoka zirabaruma kugira ngo ubibutse Amategeko yawe,
nyamara wabagobotse vuba kugira ngo batakwibagirwa burundu,
warabagobotse kugira ngo batibagirwa ubugiraneza bwawe.
Koko rero Nyagasani, nta muti uwo ari wo wose wabakijije,
ahubwo Ijambo ryawe ni ryo ryabakijije.
Ni wowe ufite ububasha ku buzima n'urupfu,
ni wowe ujyana abantu ikuzimu kandi ni wowe ubakurayo.
Umuntu ashobora kwica undi kubera ubugome,
nyamara ntashobora gusubiza ubuzima uwo yishe,
nta n'ubwo yashobora kumukura ikuzimu.
Nta muntu ushobora guhunga ububasha bwawe.
Abagome banze kukumenya wabahanishije ububasha bwawe,
barimbuwe n'imvura y'umurindi n'urubura,
barimbuwe n'inkubi y'umuyaga kandi batwikwa n'umuriro.
Uwo muriro warushagaho kugurumana,
igitangaje ni uko amazi atashoboye kuwuzimya,
koko ibyaremwe birengera intungane.
Hari ubwo umuriro wanyuzagamo ugacogora,
waracogoraga kugira ngo udatsemba ibikōko byatererejwe abagome,
ibyo byari ukubereka ko bakurikiranywe n'igihano cy'Imana.
Hari ubwo kandi umuriro wagurumanaga cyane,
waragurumanaga cyane nubwo wari mu mazi,
waragurumanaga kugira ngo utsembe imyaka yo muri icyo gihugu cy'abagome.
Nyamara abantu bawe wabahaye ibyokurya by'abamarayika
aho uri mu ijuru wabahaye umugati uteguwe neza bataruhiye,
umugati ufite uburyohe bwose kandi unogeye bose.
Ibyokurya wabahaga byagaragazaga ubugwaneza ugirira abana bawe,
koko byabaga binogeye uwabiryaga,
byamereraga buri wese uko abyifuza.
Ibyo byokurya nubwo byasaga n'amasimbi cyangwa urubura,
umuriro ntiwigeze ubishongesha.
Byatumye abantu bawe bamenya uko umuriro watsembye imyaka y'abanzi babo,
ibyo byabaye mu gihe cya ya nkubi y'umuyaga n'imvura y'amahindu.
Uwo muriro wagabanyaga ubukana bwawo,
warabugabanyaga kugira ngo intungane zibone ibizitunga.
Ibyaremwe byiteguye kugukorera wowe Muremyi wabyo,
birivumbagatanya kugira ngo abagome bahanwe,
nyamara biracururuka kugira ngo bigirire neza abakwiringira.
Ni yo mpamvu muri uko guhinduka ukundi,
byari byiteguye kuba igikoresho cy'ubuntu bwawe,
ubuntu bwawe bwo kugaburira abantu bose uko babyifuza.
Nyagasani, ibyo byabereye kwigisha abana bawe ukunda,
byabereye kubumvisha ko abantu badatungwa gusa n'ibyo bahinze,
nyamara ko ijambo ryawe ari ryo ribeshaho abakwemera.
Koko ikitangizwaga n'umuriro cyashongeshwaga n'imirase yoroheje y'izuba,
washakaga kubamenyesha ko bagomba kugusingiza izuba ritararasa,
wabamenyeshaga ko bagomba kugusenga bugicya.
Koko rero icyizere cy'indashima kizayoyoka nk'urume,
kizapfa ubusa nk'amazi adafite akamaro.
Nyagasani, imiginzereze yawe ni intagereranywa,
ni intagereranywa kandi biragoye kuyisobanukirwa,
ni na yo mpamvu abapfapfa bayobye.
Abagome bibwiye ko bakandamije ubwoko witoranyirije,
baheze mu mwijima no mu ijoro ridacya,
bafungiwe mu mazu yabo bavutswa urukundo rwawe ruhoraho.
Bibwiraga ko ibyaha bakoreye mu ibanga bizibagirana ntibigaragare,
nyamara baratatanye bagira ubwoba bwinshi,
bakangaranyijwe na za baringa.
Aho bahungiye ntihababujije kugira ubwoba,
bumvaga urusaku rukabije hirya no hino,
babonaga za baringa zishavuye kandi ziteye ubwoba.
Umuriro ntiwashoboraga kubamurikira,
urumuri rw'inyenyeri na rwo ntirwashoboraga kumurikira iryo joro riteye ubwoba.
Bamurikirwaga gusa n'umuriro wiyatsaga ubwawo,
barawubonaga bikabatera ubwoba,
iyo bamaraga kuwubona bakomezaga gukangarana,
basangaga ibyo bamaze kubona biteye ubwoba kuruta uko babikekaga.
Amayeri y'abapfumu nta cyo yari akimaze,
ubuhanga bwose biratanaga bwabakojeje isoni.
Abibwiraga ko bashobora kumara abantu ubwoba n'imitima ihagaze,
abo na bo bari bafite ubwoba budafite ishingiro.
Nubwo nta kintu gikanganye cyabaga gihari ngo kibatere ubwoba,
umuvuduko w'udusimba n'urusaku rw'ibikururuka hasi,
ibyo byonyine byari bihagije kugira ngo bakangarane.
Bahindaga umushyitsi bakicwa n'ubwoba,
ntibatinyukaga no kureba uwo mwijima badashobora kwigobotora.
Koko ubugome bugaragaza ububwa kandi bwicira urubanza,
nubwo umutimanama ubushinja buhora bugambiriye ikibi.
Ubwoba rero si ikindi,
ni ukubura ubwenge butekereza.
Uko umuntu agenda abura ibitekerezo bishyitse,
ni ko arushaho kutamenya ibituma ahagarika umutima.
Abo bantu muri iryo joro riteye ubwoba,
ijoro ritewe n'ikuzimu hateye ubwoba,
bose ntibabashaga gusinzira.
Bikangaga za baringa zibatera ubwoba,
ubundi bakazikama bitewe no gucika intege,
koko bari batashywe n'ubwoba budasanzwe.
Bityo uwabaga ari aho yikubitaga hasi,
yameraga nk'ufungiye muri gereza idafungurwa.
Yaba umuhinzi, umushumba cyangwa umuntu ufite akazi mu cyaro,
buri wese yagwirirwaga n'icyago adashobora kwigobotora.
Koko bose bari ku ngoyi y'umwijima,
iyo bumvaga umuyaga uhuha,
iyo bumvaga indirimbo nziza z'inyoni mu mashami y'ibiti,
iyo bumvaga amazi asuma,
iyo bumvaga urusaku rw'amabuye akocagurana,
iyo bumvaga imirindi y'inyamaswa zisimbagurika,
iyo bumvaga umworomo w'ibikōko by'inkazi,
iyo bumvaga nyiramubande yo mu bikombe by'imisozi,
ibyo byose byabateraga ubwoba.
Nyamara isi yose yari imurikiwe n'umucyo urabagirana,
buri wese yakoraga umurimo we nta nkomyi.
Abo bonyine ni bo bari babundikiwe n'umwijima,
uwo mwijima wari umeze nk'uzababundikira bapfuye,
ariko ishavu bari bafite ryari ribaremereye kurusha umwijima.
Icyo gihe abantu bawe bari bamurikiwe n'umucyo urabagirana,
abanzi babo bumvaga ijwi ryabo ariko ntibababone,
bavugaga ko bo bahiriwe kuko batakibabara.
Bashimiraga abantu bawe ko batihōreye kubera inabi bagiriwe,
babasabye imbabazi z'uko babarwanyije.
Abantu bawe ntibagumye mu mwijima,
wabahaye inkingi y'umuriro
iyo nkingi yari imeze nk'izuba ryoroheje ryabayoboraga mu rugendo ruhire.
Nyamara abanzi babo bari bakwiye kuguma mu mwijima,
koko bari baragize imfungwa abantu bawe,
abantu bawe bagombaga guha isi urumuri rudashira rw'Amategeko yawe.
Abo banzi bari bagambiriye kwica abana bato b'abantu bawe,
umwe muri bo yarabagabijwe ariko ararokoka.
Wabahanishije kwica benshi mu bana babo,
wabaroheye icyarimwe mu mazi y'umuvumba ukaze.
Nyamara ba sogokuruza bari barabwiwe mbere y'igihe iby'iryo joro,
barabibwiwe kugira ngo banezezwe n'amasezerano wabasezeranyije.
Abantu bawe bari bazi ko intungane zagombaga gukizwa muri iryo joro,
bari bazi kandi ko abanzi babo bagombaga kurimbuka.
Koko rero ku bw'icyo gikorwa wahannye abanzi bacu,
bityo natwe uduhesha ikuzo kandi uduhamagarira kuba abawe.
Abakwiyeguriye bakomoka ku ntungane batambaga ibitambo mu ibanga,
bashyiraga hamwe bagakurikiza Amategeko y'Imana,
ayo Mategeko yabatozaga gusangira amahirwe n'ibyago,
baririmbaga indirimbo z'ibisingizo za ba sekuruza.
Nyamara urusaku rw'amajwi anyuranye y'abanzi babo rwumvikanaga hose,
baririraga abana babo bapfuye.
Inkoreragahato na shebuja bahanwaga kimwe,
umuturage usanzwe akababara kimwe n'umwami.
Bose bari bapfushije abantu batagira ingano bazize urupfu rumwe,
abarokotse ntibari bagihagije kugira ngo bahambe abapfuye,
koko abana babo bakunzwe cyane bari barimbutse mu kanya gato.
Abo bantu ntibitaye ku miburo,
bishingikirije ububasha bw'abapfumu babo,
nyamara babonye abana babo b'impfura barimbutse,
ni bwo bamenye ko Abisiraheli ari abana b'Imana
Icyo gihe ijoro ryari ririmbanyije,
ahantu hose harangwaga ituze.
Ako kanya ijambo ryawe rifite ububasha riva mu ijuru ku ntebe ya cyami,
ryaje nk'umurwanyi w'intwari rimanukira mu gihugu cyavumwe,
ryaje ryitwaje amabwiriza yawe nk'inkota ityaye
Ryari rihagaze ku isi rikora ku ijuru,
ryujuje imirambo ku isi hose.
Ako kanya abo bantu barota inzozi zibakura umutima,
bityo batahwa n'ubwoba bwinshi.
Buri muntu arambarara iruhande rw'undi ameze nk'uwapfuye,
basambagurikaga bavuga icyo bazize.
Koko izo nzozi zari zabamenyesheje icyo bazize,
bagombaga kumenya icyo bazize mbere yo gupfa.
Urwo rupfu rwageze no ku ntungane,
abantu benshi barimbukiye mu butayu,
nyamara uburakari bwawe ntibwamaze igihe kirekire.
Koko umuntu w'indakemwa yihutiye kubagoboka,
yakoresheje intwaro z'umurimo we,
izo ntwaro ni isengesho n'umubavu w'igitambo gihongerera ibyaha,
yacubije ubwo burakari maze icyago kirashira,
yerekanye atyo ko ari umugaragu wawe.
Yatsinze ubukana atari ku bw'imbaraga z'umubiri,
yabutsinze adakoresheje intwaro,
ijambo ni ryo yakoresheje ahagarika umurimbizi,
yibukije indahiro n'amasezerano byagiriwe ba sokuruza.
Icyo gihe intumbi zakomezaga kugwira,
uwo muntu arahagoboka ahagarika icyo cyorezo,
yaragihagaritse kugira ngo kitagera no ku bakiri bazima.
Ku ikanzu ye ndende hari hashushanyijeho isi yose,
amazina y'ikuzo ya ba sekuruza yari yanditswe ku mirongo ine y'amabuye yari ayitatsweho,
yari atamirije igitambaro gitatsweho ikuzo ry'Imana.
Umurimbuzi yarabibonye agira ubwoba asubira inyuma,
koko uburakari wabarakariye bwonyine bwari buhagije.
Abo bagome wakomeje kubarakarira,
koko Nyagasani wari usanzwe uzi ibyo bagambiriye gukora,
wari uzi ko bazahatira abantu bawe kugenda,
wari uzi kandi ko bazisubiraho bakabakurikirana.
Koko rero igihe Abanyamisiri bari bakiri mu cyunamo,
igihe bajyaga ku mva kuririra ababo bapfuye,
bibagiwe ibyababayeho bisubiraho,
bakurikiranye abo bari bahatiye kugenda nk'aho ari impunzi.
Igihano bari bateganyirijwe cyabateye gukora icyo gikorwa kibi cyane,
